description.en: This course takes the vehicle industry as an example to introduce the vehicle production and marketing in the part of production preparation, mass production control, new car marketing, used car marketing, after service, insurance, etc. The purpose of this course is to increase students' knowledge of vehicle industry and enhance students' competitive advantage.

description.zh: 1.靜電場理論：庫倫定律、高斯定律、電位能、電場能量與功、拉普勒斯方程式、邊界值間題、電容；  2.靜磁場理論：直流電流、安培定律； 3.電磁感應：法拉第定律、電機原理；4.靜磁場理論：畢沙瓦特、安培定律、磁位能、磁場能量與功、強 磁性材料特性電感  5.馬克思威爾方程式。
description.en: This is an introductory course of electromagnetics base on its Engineering applications. The course is divided into five parts :1.Static electric field  2.Steady electric current  3.Static magnetic field  4.Stationary electromagnetic field   5.Maxwell equations and their applications.  6.Besides, the course also introduces some of the optical technology.

description.zh: 本課程包括下列主題:網路商業環境和未來發展, 網路行銷,網路公關,網路商店之經營, 及線上廣告交易。
description.en: This course includes following topics: network commerce environment and future development, network marketing, network PR, network store management, on-line advertisement and business, and network business safety.

description.zh: 專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論
description.en: Literature Study, Seminar, Group meeting.

description.zh: 本課程主要在介紹應用於工業或製程上之冷凍系統的原理設計與應用。主要內容包含: 製冰、溜冰場、食品製程、水壩建造與相關土木應用、化學工業製程、以及相關冷凍節能技術。
description.en: The main objective of this course is to introduce the principles of the refrigeration systems used in industrial applications. The topics of this course include the following: 1). Ice manufacture. 2) Ice rinks. 3) Food processing. 4) Concrete dams and subsurface soils. 5) Refrigeration in the chemical industry. 6) Energy saving technology.

description.zh: 「現代真空技術」課程概述真空技術廣泛應用在高科技產業中，如半導體、平面顯示器、光電、薄膜、低溫冷凍、太陽能、材料冶金、生物科技等。近幾年來由於高科技產業的蓬勃發展，帶動了真空產業的起飛，使得真空技術的發展一日千里，本課程除了介紹基本真空技術原理之外，另外將介紹目前在高科技產業中所使用的各項真空系統及相關零組件。課程內容包含有真空技術基礎、真空幫浦、真空計、真空材料與元件、抽氣過程與幫浦大小之選擇、真空系統、真空測漏技術與真空技術之應用。
description.en: The vacuum technology and industry are growing fast in the past two decades because of the highly growing of the high-tech industries including semiconductor, flat panel displayer, optics-electrics, thin film, cryogenic, solar energy, material, and biotechnology. The course will introduce the basic vacuum technology and the newly vacuum equipment and related vacuum components widely used in modern high-tech industrials. The contents of the course are basic vacuum technology, vacuum pump, vacuum gauge, material and component, pumping system, leak detection, and applications of vacuum technology.

description.zh: 熱傳學主要內容是研究由於溫度梯度所造成能量傳遞之一門學問﹐為一般冷凍、空調、食品冷藏及各類型熱交換器設計之基本知識程,其他大如各類發電廠，小如電腦微晶片散熱亦有密切關係。本課程之安排以奠定學生在熱傳方面之智能，作為未來進入冷凍、空調與能源相關學門之踏腳石。
description.en: 1.	熱傳導定律之推導2.	一維及多維的穩態與暫態熱傳分析，3.	散熱片之設計，利用數值方法解熱傳導問題，4.	對流原理之推導5.	強迫對流方面的分析及應用-層流邊界層，管道內層流熱傳6.	自然對流方面的分析及應用-管道外與封閉空間內自然對流        熱傳7.	紊流的基本性，紊流邊界層，管道內紊流8.	具相變化的熱對流:凝結與沸騰9.	熱交換器設計介紹Advanced Heat Transfer  Credit: 3 Course Outline1.	Derivation of heat conduction principles 2.	One and multi-dimentional steady and transient heat         conduction analysis3.	Heat transfer from extended surfaces, numerical heat         conduction analysis4.	Derivation of convection principles 5.	Forced convection - laminar boundary layers and     laminar heat transfer in ducts6.	Nature convection over external surfaces and in internal enclosures 7.	Fundamentals of turbulence, turbulent boundary layers, turbulent flow in ducts8.	Heat transfer with phase change: boiling and condensation9.	Introduction to heat-exchanger design

description.zh: 介紹空調系統節能的理論與實用技術。內容包括：空調元件能源秏損分析，系統搭配之操作性能及總體熱效率評估，耗能因素改善方法與技術，節能設備之原理與設計技術。
description.en: The course is prepared for the theory and technology of ventilation energy conservation. The topics are: energy loss analysis of system components, survey of system cop and overall efficiency, improving methods and technology, and the fundamentals and design technology of energy conservation devices.

description.zh: 污染源分析，室內空氣品質標準，濃度平衡之計算法，空氣之過濾原理與設計，建築通風法規，生物潔淨室標準，化學過濾應用，ASHRAE 62標準之探討
description.en: Pollution source analysis, indoor air quality standards, balance of concentration, air filtration theories and designs, building ventilation standards, bio-clean room standards, chemical filtration, discussion on ASHRAE standard 62.

description.zh: 針對學生之學習研究心得報告，集體討論，以訓練學生研究之能力。
description.en: Group Discussion.

description.zh: 企業研究的本質、科學方法、研究之概念基礎、理論與研究、研究之概念基、礎、研究問題與假設、文獻參考與研究變數、操作性定義之建立、測量、理論架構模型化、研究設計、研究草案、調查研究法、問卷法、訪問研究法、歷史文憲法與觀察法、個案研究法、量表法、實驗法、資料之分析法、單變量分析與一般統計分析、多變量分系、資料的解釋、研究報告、企業研究與決策之應用。
description.en: The nature of business research、scientific method、conceptual foundations of research、theory and research、elements of research and research process、research problem and hypothesis、literature review and variable of research、constructing operational definitions、measurement、modeling theoretical structures、research design、 research proposal、survey research、questionnaires、interview technique、documentary historical method and observation、case study、scaling、experiment、data analysis、univariate analysis and general statistical analysis、multivariate analysis、the interpretation of data、research report、policy implication of business research

description.zh: 說明專案投資之經濟分析與評估，內容:專案投資模式、專案分析準則、投資風險分析、不確定性環境下的投資策略
description.en: This course is to interpret the economic analysis and evaluation of investment project. The main topics include project investment models, project criteria, investment risk analysis, investment decision under uncertainty.

description.zh: 本課程包含下列主題：網路商業環境和未來發展，網路行銷，網路公關，網路商店之經營，線上廣告及交易。
description.en: This course includes following topics: network commerce environment and future development, network marketing, network PR, network store management, on-line advertisement and business, and network business safty.

description.zh: 中文概述：專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論。
description.en: Case study. Seminar. Group meeting.

description.zh: 本課程在訓練學生熟悉統計方法與理論，使能利用已知的資料，經由整理、分析並作成合理解讀，作為教育相關研究工具。課程內容包括機率、抽樣分配與估計，假設考驗，相關迥歸分析、變異數分析等。
description.en: This course is designed to equip students with ability to analyze and interpret experiments and surveys. Course contains include probability concept, sampling distribution, interval estimation, hypothesis testing and analysis of variance.

description.zh: 教學評量範圍、目的、沿革與發展，評量策略、評量結果分析及應用。
description.en: Application of personal computer to processes of classroom measurement and testing; test writing, scoring and evaluation based on computer use.

description.zh: 學習心理的特質、範圍與研究方法；認知學派、行為學派及其他相關學派；學習領域的探索，學習效果影響變項的探索；學習心理學的應用及未來發展趨勢。
description.en: Course Description: This course provides an overview of contemporary learning theories and research methodology on learning. Topics include behavioral approaches to learning , cognitive approaches to learning , and other related learning theories, types of learning, variables that affect learning, and applications of learning theories.

name.zh: 人力資源管理專題研究
name.en: Special Topics in Human Resource Management

description.zh: 研究生探討主題可針對當前人力資源管理重要課題，挑選有興趣之子題研擬，心得報告於課堂中研討。
description.en: Exploration of concepts, current issues, and implication underlying from major research in human resource management. Discussion, selected topics research, and reporting in class are required.

name.zh: 職業分析與輔導實務研究
name.en: Practical Study of Occupation Analysis & Guidance

description.zh: 研究生探討主題可針對職業內容、從業人員條件、職業相關資料，與職業手冊編製與運用進行個案探討。
description.en: Exploration of the main research in occupation analysis & guidance. Topics include occupation contents, the requirement of enterprise worker, occupation relation occupation, and the application & compilation of occupational manual. Case study, discussion, reporting are required.

description.zh: 研究生依據個人基礎:透過個別化指導，就其興趣對教育行政領域，進行小型研究問題的探討與實作以發展研究能力。
description.en: Exploration of current issues, trends and research in educational administration. An individualized study program is planned to develop the skills and research for graduate students and guided by a professor.

description.zh: 研究生提出產學合作領域有關的個人構想計劃書，經由個別化指導，可以深入探討新的發現並提出研究心得報告。
description.en: An individualized study is planned for graduate students and guided by a professor. The students have to offer the proposal of specific topical interests and conceptual frameworks in enterprise cooperative program. Analysis of current issues and conclusion or implications underlying major research in enterprise cooperative program through independent, directed study.

name.zh: 電腦教學理論與研究發展

description.zh: 研究生針對當前電腦教學理論與發展研究主題進行討論，包含應用研究和教學技巧等方面。
description.en: A study of theories & development in computer instruction, including the application of research, aspects of instructional techniques surrounding computer-assisted instruction, and discussion of current topics research in computer instruction.

description.zh: 探討教育研究方法，培養研究的基本能力,具備研究的正確觀念與態度,本課程將探索質與量的研究、研究設計、取樣與量測、並設計了許多討論,實作和報告的活動,以結合研究方法的知識探討與實作技能。
description.en: An introduction to the process and methods of educational research and to developing a plan or proposal for research in the field. Topics include qualitative and quantitative research traditions, structure of a research article, research problem literature review and the role of Theory.

description.zh: 教育行政理論的歷史背景、學校科層體制、學校領導、決策、溝通理論、學校效能研究，及其相關實務之研究。
description.en: Historical background of the theories of educational administration; theories of school soscial system; school departmental hierarchy; school atomsphere; school leadership;studies of school efficiency; as well as practice of educational administration.

name.en: Research in Theories of Technial-Vocational Education

description.zh: 剖析技職教育的理論基礎、本質與特性研究。能力本位、群集、建教合作、生涯教育、職業輔導等理念對技職教育的影響，並對我國技職教育發展及特有問題的背景、產生原因以及解決之道深入探討。
description.en: Examination of objectives, foundation, basic theories and distinction in technical-vocational education. Topics include competency analysis, cluster analysis, cooperative program, life education, and career counseling. In depth study of background, current issues, trends, and conclusion or implication underlying main research in technical-vocational education.

name.zh: 技職教育課程發展實務研究
name.en: Studies in Practice of Curriculum Development in Technical-V

description.zh: 探討課程發展理論並以職業分析、社會需求等因素為基礎，決定技職教育課程目標、課程內涵。並進行課程評鑑等實務研。
description.en: Tednds in methodology for desinging, and evaluating curriculum in technical-vocational education at  vocational high school and community college levels; as well as practice research.

description.zh: 探討我國技職教育發展的背景、組織及影響；西洋技職教育的發展沿革、歷程、關鍵人物及其影響之研究。
description.en: To study the historical development of Vocatinal-Technical Education(VTE) in major country; focusing on educational background. System and individuals  influencing VTE.

name.zh: 技職學校行政實務研究

description.zh: 技職學校行政理論的歷史背景、學校社會系統理論、學校科層體制、學校氣氛、學校領導、決策、溝通理論、學校效能研究。
description.en: Introduction to the fields of technical-vocational school administration. Topics include historical development of technical-vocational educational administration, theories of technical vocational educational administration, theories of school social system, school departmental hierarchy, school atmosphere, school leadership, theories of decision-making and communication, studies of school efficiency.

description.zh: （一）瞭解、預測及控制組織內工成員的行為；（二）培養積極有效管理組織內工成員的行為之基本能力。課程內容以個体、團体與組織三層次為經，行為基礎、激勵理論、個体決策、團体行為、團体決策、溝通理論、領導、權力與政治、組織設計、組織文化、組織變革與發展等相關議題。課程實施方法為講解、討論、個案研究及專題討論。
description.en: Human behavior in work organizations; nature of organizations; models of organization; design work structuring; motivation and performance; group and inter-group behavior; influence processes and planned change. Discussion, case study, and selected topics research are required.

description.zh: 研究生依據個人基礎:透過個別化指導，就其興趣對教育理論領域，進行小型研究問題的探討與實作以發展研究能力。
description.en: Exploration of current issues, trends, theories, and research in educational theory. An individualized study program is planned to develop the skills and research for graduate students and guided by a professor.

description.zh: 研究生依據個人基礎:透過個別化指導，就其興趣對技職教育學制領域，進行小型研究問題的探討與實作以發展研究能力。
description.en: An individualized study program is planned to develop the skills and research for graduate students and guided by a professor. Exploration of current issues, theories, and research in technical- vocation education schooling system.

name.zh: 獨立研究--評鑑方案規劃

description.zh: 研究生透過個別化的學習方式，就其興趣對技職教育評鑑方案規劃領域，進行小型研究問題的探討與實作，以發展研究能力。
description.en: An individualized study program is planned to develop the skills and research for graduate students and guided by a professor. Analysis of current issues and conclusion or implications underlying major research in planning of evaluation project.

description.zh: 本課程將透過每週專題演講方式，讓學生了解有機材料之最新開發成品或最先進之研究成果。演講者之安排將以校外知名專家學者及校內各計畫執行者為主。
description.en: This course will provide important information regarding to the latest development or application on the organic materials. Speakers being invited are well-known scholars in organic area.  Graduate students or thesis advisors will also be invited to report any in interesting result from their graduate studies.

description.zh: 本課程是針對已修習一年的大學有機化學的同學，因此課程規劃成反應、機構與結構式等三個主要部分。修畢本課程的同學應已具有瞭解有機化學相關論文與研究成果的能力。
description.en: This course is designed for students who have taken one-year undergraduate organic chemistry course. It is divided into the three fundamental aspects of the study of organic chemistry:reactions, mechanisms and structure. A student who has completed this course should be able to approach the literature directry, with a sound knowledge of modern basic organic chemistry.

description.zh: 本課程主要探討高分子在溶液及固態時的物理化學現象及其應用。內容包括�溶液熱力學?高分子的微結構及定性。�溶液熱力學探討統計熱力學、晶格理論、Flory-Huggin理論、Flory-Krigbaum理論、相分離、θ-溫度、滲透壓、GPC測分子量、高分子膠體。?高分子之微結構包括有高分子之形狀、自由旋轉分子鏈距離、光散射、中子散射、排拒體積、碎形、霍氏光譜及核磁共振儀在高分子微結構之分析。
description.en: The course is to investigate the physical phenomena of macromolecules in the solution and solid state. It includes the solution thermodynamics and chemical microstructure of polymer chains.The solution thermodynamics is to study lattice theory, statistical thermodynamics, Flory-Huggin theory, Flory-Krigbaum theory, phase separation, θ-temperature, Osmometry, GPC, and polymer gels.Light scattering and Neutron scattering are used to characterize the polymer microstructure. Polymer radius of gyration, freely rotating chains, excluded volume, fractal, and scaling are also discussed. Finally, spectroscopy methods are used to study polymerization models and microstructure.

name.en: Analysis and Identification of Organic Materials

description.zh: 本課程包含材料的結構鑑定和材料的性質分析。材料的結構鑑定方法有：元素分析、吸收光譜法、振動光譜法、核磁共振光譜法、質譜法、x-射線光譜法和電子顯微鏡法。材料的性質分析包含：材料熱性質(DSC, TGA, TMA,DMA)和材料機械性質(伸張、壓縮、剪力強度等)。
description.en: The materials of the course include structure identification and property analysis of materials. Methods of structure identification  of materials are : elemental analysis, absorption spectroscopy, vibration spectroscopy, nuclear magnetic resonance spectroscopy, mass spectrometry, x-ray spectroscopy and electron microscopy. Metheds of property analysis of materials are : thermal properties of materials (DSC,TGA,TMA,DMA) and mechanical properties of materials (tensile, compression and shear strengths).

description.zh: 高分子流變學本課程以講述高分子流體之黏性及彈性為主。內容包括:(1) 黏彈性簡介(2)時間溫度轉換(3)非結晶區之玻璃轉移點(4)橡膠理論(5)黏彈模型(6)介電鬆弛等專題。
description.en: This course will extensively study the viscosity and elasticity of polymeric materials. The main contents include(1) Phenomenalogical Treatment of Viscoelasticity(2) Time-Temperature Correspondence(3) Transitions and Relaxation in Amorphous Polymers(4) Rubber Elasticity(5) Viscoelastic Models(6) Dielectric Relaxation

description.zh: 本課程包含用於移植、非移植和體外的材料。移植的材料包含縫線、人工血管、人工心臟、人工骨頭、韌帶、藥物徐放裝置、人工皮膚、人工肝臟等。非移植的材料有醫療用衣服、繃帶、注射器材、診療用材料等。體外的材料包含透析膜、人工肺、人工導管等。
description.en: The material in this course covers implantable, nonimplantable, and extracorporeal materials. Implantables include sutures, vascular grafts, artificial heart, artificial bones and ligaments, drug delivery device, artificial tissues, artificial liver,etc. Nonimplantable materials are : cloths in medical uses,  surgical dressings and gauze, injection device, diagonsis materials, etc. Extracorporeal materials are : dialysis fibers, artificial lung, catheters, etc.

description.zh: 本課程介紹複合材料的原理，包括複合材料的高分子化學、複合材料的加工方法、複合材料的力學分析與設計、以及複合材料在高科技上的應用。加工方法包括真空袋成型法、壓力釜成形法、樹脂移送成型、編織法、纏繞成形法、拉擠成型法、模壓法…等，本課程詳述這些加工方法的原理及應用，同時介紹力學分析及設計，應力和應變之關係，複材之彎曲、靜態和動態之強度、脫層、耐久性、及以力學觀點設計複合材料，最後討論複合材料如何應用於高科技及民生工業上。
description.en: This course is to elucidate the principle and potential application of composite materials. It includes polymer chemistry, design and analysis of composite, and processing methods. The composite processings include autoclaves,vacuum vags, resin transform molding, braiding, filament winding, pultrusions, sheet molding compound,…etc. The principles and application of the methods will be elucidated. The analysis and design, strain-stress relationships, extension and bending, static and dynamic strengths, and delamination, will also be discussed. Finally, the potential application of the composite in high-tech industries will be elucidated.

description.zh: 此課程之目標是講授生物化學原理，包含生物分子構形、代謝能源之製造與儲存，生物大分子之合成，基因訊息，人類生化之觀點。
description.en: The aim of this course is to introduce the principle of biochemistry, including biomolecular conformation, generation and storage of metabolic energy, biosynthesis of macromolecular precursors, genetic information, some aspects of human biochemistry.

description.zh: 企業在激烈國際競爭下，必需要提昇產品及服務之品質，國際品質管理標準，對世界貿易有很大助益。因此，台灣紡織業界卻積極想獲ISO 9000與ISO 14000之驗證。因此，此課程包含：(1) 國際標準化(2) ISO 9000系列品質管理系統之標準(3) ISO 14000環境管理系統之標準(4) 符合標準之評估(5) 驗證機構與品質稽核(6) 如何準備驗證(7) 成功驗證之事例研究
description.en: In the time of increasing global competition it is essential for companies to have products or services of a high quality. Recognition that the quality management system is of an internationally recognized standard is a great aid in global market. Consequently, Taiwanese textile corporations have increasingly sought ISO 9000 and ISO 14000 certification. Therefore, the course covers:  (1)  Global standardization(2)  ISO 9000 series quality management systems standards(3)  ISO 14000 environmental management systems standards(4)  Conformity assessment (5)  Certification body and quality auditing(6)  How to seek certification(7)  Successful certification: The case studies

description.zh: 研究生相較於大學期間訓練的最主要差別在於其必須從事個人的學術研究。因此，研究生須要資訊與洞察力以達成獲得較高學位之論文寫作能力。故本課程主要內容包括：  一、 研究的特性  二、 智慧收集-「什麼」的問題  三、 研究-「何故」的問題  四、 良好研究的特質  五、 研究的基本類型  六、 從事研究的技能  七、 研究倫理  八、 研究設計練習
description.en: The necessity for personal academic research is the key cultural change that postgraduate students will encounter compared with their undergraduate days. Thus, postgraduate students need information and insights to develop the capacity to operate successfully achieving a higher-level degree. To examine these concerns, the course includes:1. Characteristics of research2. Intelligence-gathering-the "what" questions3. Research-the "why" questions4. Characteristics of good research5. Basic types of research6. The craft of doing research7. Research ethics8. Research design practice

description.zh: 空間結構為一意義之表層結構（表達形式），深層結構為意義表達形式建構之運算規則，自素材中系統地抽取深義部份，統合成一意義深層結構：誘導式結構。此深層結構為一內化於主體之新經驗即情境，為利自身回饋與外在檢驗，深層結構不能外於主、客之交互文字論述建構。邏輯為回饋與外驗二者之有效推理與洞察之建構與檢驗工具，效力建立於置信概率上，因此誘導式結構之建構亦不能脫離於時空之相對合理外。
description.en: Space Structure is the Surface Structure of a represented meaning while H.S.is the Deep Structure and the Constructing Operator of the represented meaning. The Deep Structure was the unity of the significance abstracted from the materials systematically. The Deep Structure as an interiorized experience also called Situation, should not be seperated from the correlative construction of language expond, which will provide the opportunities for the outside inspection and the introspection. Logic is the fundation of the construction and the two-way inspections of the valid reasoning and insight. The validity is based on the credal probability, hence, the H.S.will be restricted in the boundary of Relative Time and Space.Situation as the operator of intuition, will combine the physical materials as a representational formation.

description.zh: 本課程主要在論述計畫於都市發展過程的干預以及維護環境永續發展之分派與管理角色，其內容包括：    一、 規劃、規劃師與計畫    二、 1800年到1900年的都市發展    三、 都市計畫的先驅著    四、 戰後規劃的開創    五、 國土與區域計畫    六、 都市與都市區域計畫    七、 歐美的都市計畫    八、 未來聚落的都市規劃
description.en: This course is mainly to discuss the role of planning as a form of intervention in the development process, and introduce the role of planning in the allocation and management of a sustainable environment. Thus the course including:    1. Planning, planners and plans    2. The origins: urban growth from 1800 to 1940    3. The seers: pioneer thinkers in urban planning, from        1880 to 1945    4. The creation of the postwar planning machine, from        1940 to 1952    5. National/regional planning from 1945 to 1990    6. Planning for cities and city regions from 1945 to        1990    7. Planning in Western Europe, United States since 1945    8. Settlements into the 21st century

description.zh: 1. 女性主義理論介紹、本土婦運與婦女團體介紹2. 性別刻板印象與影響3. 生活時間、空間與性別4. 住宅與性別5. 學校環境與性別6. 都市公共空間與性別7. 交通、消費與性別8. 就業市場與性別9. 女性與休閒110. 社區發展與婦女11. 質性研究方法簡介
description.en: 1. Feminism: Theories & Its branches2. Introduction of Gender 3. Gender & Time-space of daily life4. Houses & Gender5. Education Environment & Gender6. Urban Space & Gender7. Traffic、consume & Gender8. Gender & work9. Women & Leisure10. Community Development & women11. Introduction of research method

name.en: Landscape Design Method of Regional Approach

description.zh: 景觀，從比較完整的角度來看，既是人文的，也是自然的整體表現。現代化的普及知識和普同技術帶來對自然環境的衝擊和地區景觀特色的趨同，已經使得從事景觀設計專業警覺到應該反省當前景觀設計方法和表達的適當性。自從 1960年代以來被景觀建築專業奉為圭鎳的自然環境導向的設計方法已經開始遭到質疑。本課程從地域觀點講述有關的主張與理論；尤其以台灣地區為對象探討特定地區課題，以及依此理念所發展出的這一套設計理論與方法。此一課程的設計方法將可提供有興趣選擇環境設計方向論文的同學可能的觀念性架構。    1.  當代台灣景觀設計思潮與問題    2.  地域性環境規畫設計理論    3.  地域性景觀設計的內涵    4.  地域性景觀設計方法    5.  地域性景觀設計的實務
description.en: Landscape, from a more comprehensive viewpoint, involves with either natural environment or humanistic expression. The universal knowledge and technology brought about the significant impact to environment and the tendency of universal homogeneity. Looking for more regional reflected approach to landscape design has been a concern in searching for regionally sound landscape. Landscape practice in Taiwan is unexceptional to this phenomenon at all. To underscore the regional approach the course includes the issues below;    1.  Vision and fallacy of contemporary landscape design     2.  Rationale of the regional planning and design    3.  The body of regional design in landscape    4.  Method of regional approach to landscape design    5.  The practice of regional landscape design

description.zh: 本課程主要講授建築+都市設計之理念（A + U），並給予學生作適當的練習，模型製作與電腦模擬，讓研究生藉由此門課程之訓練能深入瞭解建築空間與尺度、築配置敷地、敷地開放空間與都市空間、建築量體等之練習。實習內容：1. 建築基本設計：以住宅為例，訓練學生對建築設計有初步之瞭解及操作經驗，含空間、機能、形式、構造及配置等基本訓練。2. 建築與都市空間設計：含建築量體及相關法規之應用，並以一個地區為例，調查分析不同的設計手法對都市空間的衝擊。

name.en: Special Topics on Environmental Behanior Studies

description.zh: 本課程的目的是探討人類行為與環境設計間的關係，介紹環境行為學的源起與發展，及其相關理論與分析架構；並藉由觀察與評估現有生活環境中的行為，作為教導學生實際參與環境規劃之操作。
description.en: The purpose of this course is to probe the relation between human behavior and environmental design, introducing not only the original and development of environment-behavior, but also its relative theory and analysis frame. Via observing and evaluating the behavior of the present living environment , teach the student how to actually participate in the operation of environmental planning.

description.zh: 邀請各界人士到系演講，針對學術專題研究成果進行研討，並就管理技術與發展趨勢以及成功個案等介紹不同行業的營運方式及競爭力分析。
description.en: Scholars and experts will be invited to make lectures; each lecture will focus on special attribution in the field which speaker involved.

description.zh: 有關建築歷史、理論、批評、構造、營建管理等相關主題討論。
description.en: A theme topic discussion on the field of architecture history, theory, criticism, structure, construction and management, etc.

description.zh: 專題討論照明與視覺心理等課題，期能對於照明相關知識能有深刻了解，並能藉課堂的研討與文獻閱讀等方法提出見解。課程內容包括永續發展之綠色照明、照明與色彩、眩光之評價、光源之新發展、燈具之美、高齡者之照明環境、防災照明、視覺與輝度分布、照明耗能評估指標與基準、晝光利用、照明之控制、道路照明與安全、戶外照明與都市環境、光污染等。
description.en: The topic is discussed with lighting and visual psychology that expect to understand some knowledge about lighting, by the method of discussion and technical literature reading to provide an opinion about lighting. The course are including green lighting for sustainable development, lighting and color, the evaluation of glare, the new tendency of lighting source, the beauty of luminair, lighting for venerable age, lighting for fire control, visual and luminance distribution, evaluation index and base of lighting energy, the advantage of daylight, lighting control, road lighting and safety, outdoor lighting and urban environment, lighting pollution.

description.zh: 本課程主要目的是提供學生對於都市政策規劃、都市設計與方案實施等有關專業領域更深入研究之機會。專題多元而深入，諸如以下之專題皆可作為討論之主題：1.	地方發展計畫、與管理之理論與實務2.	資源規劃與管理3.	環境倫理4.	交通政策與規劃5.	土地使用規劃6.	公共設施建設7.	國外規劃比較8.	住宅政策9.	鄉村規劃10.	景觀規劃11.	綠社區12.	敷地與不動產開發管理13.	都市理論研究14.	當代規劃設計思潮與評論
description.en: The aim of the course is to provide an opportunity for in-depth study of urban specialized areas related to policy -making, urban planning and design, and implementation professional studies. The following topic areas will be offered as options for study:1.	Theories and practices in local planning, development and management2.	Resource planning and management3.	Environmental ethics4.	Transport policy and planning5.	Land use planning 6.	Public facilities construction7.	Comparative Overseas Planning8.	Housing Policy9.	Countryside Planning10.	Landscape Planning11.	Green communities12.	Site and property development13.	Urban theory research14.	Contemporary thought and commentary on planning and design

description.zh: 本課程旨在教導學生一個簡潔、廣泛又清楚的工業設計研究方法的知識及技能架構，課程包括二大部份；第一部份探討工業設計研究計畫的準備及撰擬，第二部份除比較分析主要的工業設計研究方法外，也同時探討其中一種研究方法在工業設計專業領域的應用實例。
description.en: This course is a survey of research methodology that is relevant to the Industrial Design field. It focuses on conducting an industrial design research, collect, and report the data. This course also highlights the difference among that mainstream research methodology in Industrial Design field.

description.zh: 設計相關專題，以文獻研讀，邀請專家專題演講，及論文討論為重點，參與者透過密集討論、書面報告、或舉行口頭發表等方式，可以有效率地交換意見，獲得更深入而廣泛的認識。
description.en: Topical studies in history, theory, and criticism of design. Under the above goals, inviting addresses for special topics will be arranged though the courses. The Participants are encouraged to have intensive discussion, written reports, or further oral presentation. Efficient opinion exchange would be also expected to derive more extensive interest.

description.zh: 設計相關專題，以文獻研讀，邀請專家專題演講，及論文討論為重點，參與者透過密集討論、書面報告、或舉行口頭發表等方式，可以有效率地交換意見，獲得更深入而廣泛的認識。
description.en: Topical studies in history, theory, and criticism of design. Under the above goals, inviting addresses for special topics will be arranged though the courses. The Participants are encouraged to have intensive discussion, written reports, or further oral presentation. Efficient opinion exchange would be also expected to derive more extensive interest.

description.zh: 科學理論、計畫理論、傳播理論、美學、記號學、建築學等室內設計實務相關之理論，以培養獨立企劃、分析、評斷、組織、歸納與設計之思考能力，並實際演練應用於設計實務，以建立室內設計之理論基礎。
description.en: This course provides design theory of interior related topics on Science Theory, Plan Theory, Communication Theory, Esthetics, Semiotics and Architecture etc. The course will be characterized by inter-disciplinary and simulation verification.

description.zh: 設計與生活是自古以來就相生相隨的一項行為，生活型態的變化，對生活器具的要求也就不同。故本課程主要在探討研究設計行為與生活型態之關係，進而提供新思維作為設計行為之參考。
description.en: Design is a part of human life. Demands in design changes withlifestyle. This course focuses on general review of ifestyle research that is practically constructive in the process of product planning and design.。

name.zh: 室內空間與家具設計研究
name.en: Study into Interior Space and Furniture Design

description.zh: 講授人、家具、環境之介面，進而探討室內空間機能、生活機能與家具之關係性。以家具為室內空間中之機能元素之一，探討家具設計之創新思維。
description.en: A general study of interface among man, furniture and environment that related to space function, living function and the use of furniture. Design philosophy of furniture, which is considered as a functional element in interior space, is to be deliberating in the study.

description.zh: 本課程旨在研究室內設計數位化的技巧，藉由各種相關軟體與自行建立Third Party的應用，完成室內設計案虛擬實境的效果，同時以室內設計個案的實際演練，達到室內設計師與客戶間的良好溝通與充分檢討。
description.en: This course aims to study the digital techniques for interior design.  With the related software and self-made third party applications, the interior design project is conducted in the form of virtual-reality.  Meanwhile, through the practicing of interior design projects the communication between designers and clients is emphasized.

description.zh: 本科目主旨在於加強學生使用語言的表達能力、並促使學生更加容易瞭解學術論文。每週的課程是由一系列連貫性的論文來引導學生去學習即分析論文，並能以口語、寫作正確地表達出所分析論文的含義。這些所提供的研究論文都具備可精闢分析的要素。這些文章的內容有包含習慣的不同、事件的相對面、意見的分歧、喜好的差異、演繹法即歸納法得的結論等等。
description.en: This course aims to enhance oral and written communication skills and in the process provide a greater understanding of the philosophy underlying academic discourse. Weekly units are oriented around a progressive series of tasks which consider academic texts in context and require learners to understand, analyse and produce spoken and written texts appropriate to the context of academic English. The contextualisation of these tasks is the philosophical aspects of critical analysis. Themes, such as the difference between convention, fact, opinion and preference; deductive and inductive proof; validity and truth; evidence; and the ethics of persuasion, are the basis on which the skills are taught.

description.zh: 永續發展是妥善規劃與管理自然資源之最高指導原則，因此本課程﹙一﹚依此宗旨討論水資源保育、固廢管理與空氣污染控制；更將以實際例將面向擴及科技與社經整合層次，以期落實理論於實際應用之中。
description.en: This is intented as a brief introduction to the subject of the substainable development of natural resource. Main subject are water conservation, solid waste management and air pollution control. Many overall regional case studies will be discussed. It must be technologic, economic and social environmental change or a new factural data are developed

description.zh: 氣膠為懸浮在空氣中的微小固體或液體粒子。本課程深入探討氣膠科學（微塵學）及其工程上之應用。．氣膠理化特性，粒徑分布．氣膠運動學：擴散和布朗運動，過濾機制，荷電性質，熱泳等．光學特性及其應用．氣膠的測量原理與方法．大氣氣膠及生物氣膠
description.en: ．Indroduction:characterization of aerosols,shape and size distributions．Particle transport:Brownian motion and diffusion, centrifugation, intertia and filtration, convective diffusion,extermal forcr fields, thermal force．Optical properties:visibility, light scattering．Aerosol dynamics:coagulation, formation and growth．Atmospheric Aerosois and Bioaerosols．Measurement of aerosol

name.en: The Software of Mechanical Design Automation

description.zh: 本課程在使學生熟悉自動化設計軟體之環境，方法及設計原則，（如高階語言程式設計及電腦輔助自動化軟體），內容包含（1）VB程式語言介紹 （2）VB之自動化設計領域之應用 （3）Matlab  and  toolkit 之使用
description.en: This course is let students to familiarize the environments, methodologies and design principle of automation design software ( High level programming language and the automation software of computer-aid  design). They are including :1. Introduction to VB programming language. 2. The application of VB in automation design area. 3. Application of  Matlab and toolkit

name.en: The Software of Electrical Design Automation

description.zh: 本課程在使學生熟悉自動化設計軟體之環境，方法及設計原則，（如高階語言程式設計及電腦輔助電路設計自動化軟體），內容包含（1）VB程式語言介紹 （2）VB之自動化設計領域之應用 （3）spice與pspice電腦輔助電路設計軟體之介紹及應用  （4）電路佈局自動化設計軟體之介紹及應用  （5）期末專題
description.en: This course is let students to familiarize the environments, methodologies and design principle of automation design software ( High level programming language and the automation software of computer-aid circuit design). They are including :1. Introduction to VB programming language. 2. The application of VB in automation design area. 3. Introduction and application for computer-aid circuit design software(spice & pspice). 4. Introduction and application for design automatic software of circuit layout. 5. Final project.

name.zh: 自動化光學精密檢測及實習

description.zh: 本課程主要介紹自動化光學精密檢測相關技術，內容包括如下：前言，精密量測概論，機器視覺原理，二維光學檢測技術及實習，三維光學檢測技術及實習，影像處理與人工智慧技術運用，智慧型量測系統及應用，系統整合之相關技術，產業相關技術應用，及結論。
description.en: This subject is arranged to introduce the principles and techniques required in Automatic Optical Inspection (AOI). The subject includes the following subtopics: introduction to precision metrology and machine vision, the measurement principles and methods used in the 2D AOI, the measurement principles and techniques used in the 3D AOI, image processing and artificial intelligence methods used in automatic inspection, intelligent measurement systems, AOI system integration and conclusion.

description.zh: 本課程內容包括頻域的Z-轉換、取樣資料系統、數位濾波器設計、數位控制器設計、及狀態空間之數位控制器設計、電腦控制等。
description.en: This course includes Z-transformation, sampled data system, digital filter design, digital control design and implementation in frequency domain and also in state space, and computer control system.

name.en: Analysis and Simulation of Integrated Circuits

description.zh: 本課程在訓練學生如何使用電腦輔助設計軟体來分析與模擬類比及數位積体電路,進而能培養學生具有設計積体電路的能力,課程內容包念：1. 電腦輔助設計積体電路介紹2. 類比積体電路設計軟体之介紹及使用 ( SPICE Design center )3. 數位積体電路設計軟体之介紹及使用 ( Viewlogic )4. PLD的認識與介紹5. FPGA ( Xilinx )的設計6. 專題設計
description.en: This course is trained the student to use computer-aided design tools for the analysis and simulation of integrated circuits(digital & analysis) .Therefore,the student have the design capability of integrated.The contents of this course :1.introduction to the Computer-aided IC design 2.Introduction to the computer-aided deaign of analysis    integrated circuits(SPICE ,Deaign Center)and computer-  exercise3.Introduction to the computer-aided design of digital integrated circuits(Viewlogic)and computer-exercise4.Introduction to the PLD5.FPGA(XILINX)design and computer-exercise6.Project.

description.zh: 1.集合,序列與函數2.基礎邏輯3.關聯式4.計數（排列,組合）5.圖與樹（基礎圖論）6.遞迴式與演算法7.有向圖
description.en: 1.Sets Sequences and Function2.Elementary Logic3.Relations4.Counting5.Graph and Tree6.Recursion Trees and Algorithms7.Digraphs

description.zh: 瞭解程式語言所常用之各種資結構，１.抽象資料類別及運算複雜度之概念，２.靜態結構及其儲存法，３.遞迴、堆疊、前序、中序、後序運算式，４.佇列，５.串列、鏈結串列，６.樹、二元樹、平衡樹、堆積，７.圖形，８.排序，９.搜尋、雜湊。
description.en: This course is mainly aimed at introducing the data  structures commonly used in programming languages, including: (1) the concept of ADT (abstract data type) and computational complexity, (2) static structures and their storage representations , (3) recursion, stacks, and prefix, infix, and posfix expressions, (4) queues, (5) lists and linked lists, (6) trees, binary trees, height balanced trees, and heaps,  (7) graphs, (8) soring, and (9) searching and hashing.

description.zh: 瞭解常見之演算法及其分析，1.Complexity、Big-Oh符號，2.演算法之分析，3.集合、優先佇列，4.樹、平衡樹，5.排序演算法，6.搜尋演算法，7.圖形演算法，8.幾何演算法，9.NP-complete problems之理論及對策。
description.en: 1.Complexity 2.Analysis of algorithms3.Set,priorty queue4.Tree,Balanced tree5.Sorting algorithms6.Search algorithms7.Graph algorithms8.Geometry algorithms9.NP-complete problems

description.zh: 認識高頻電子電路動作原理並建立高頻電子電路設計能力，1.傳輸線原理，2.高頻元件，3.散射參數，4.史密斯圖應用，5.小信號放大器，6.低雜訊放大器，7.射頻放大器，8.振盪器，9.混波與檢波，10.功率分／合器。
description.en: 1.Transmission lineas2.High frequency component3.Scattering parameter4.Smith chart application 5.Small signal amplifier6.Low nosie amplifier7.RF amplifier8.Oscillator9.Mixers and detectors10.Power combiner/spitter

description.zh: 1.數位電視的過去現在與未來2.數位視訊影像的壓縮與編碼方式3.數位語音訊號的處理4.動畫視訊的處理與應用5.非線性剪輯6.數位視訊影像的儲存與傳送7.數位電視廣播與接收8.衛星電視系統
description.en: 1.Development of Digital Television2.Digital Video Compression3.Digital Audio and AC-3 Format4.Graphic and Composition5.Non-Linear Editing6.Digital Video Recording and Streaming Video Delivery7.Digital Television Broadcasting and Receiving8.DBS Satellite Television

description.zh: 本課程介紹類神經及模糊控制方法，大綱如下：1.簡介分散式智慧，2.類神經網路概論，3.Hopfield 網路，4.Multi-layer feed forward 網路，5.Kohonen 網路，6.Cascaded-correlation 網路，7.Simulated Annealing 網路，8.類神經網路應用於工程控制的範例研究，9.簡介模糊理論，10.模糊系統，11.Fuzzy 用於工程控制的範例研究，12.Neuralfuzzy 模式，13.應用。
description.en: 1.Introduction to neural network2.Hopfield network3.Multi-layer feed forward network4.Kohonen network5.Cascaded-correlation network6.Simulated annealing network7.Case study of neural network8.Introduction to fuzzy logic theory9.Fuzzy system10. Case study of fuzzy system11.Application

description.zh: 專題報告專題演講 研究小組討論
description.en: Case Study.Seminar.Group meeting.

description.zh: 待修正；本課程主要在教導學生對都市空間的體驗與涵構的認知，並使學生具備都市設計之基本能力與相關知識，其主要授課內容如下：1.在範圍上--主要探討都市的涵構含實質元素、自然環境及人文向度。2.在理論上--主要探討都市構成的空間基礎理論如圖地、連接及場所理論。3.在方法上--從社區居民的經營、都市設計程序的討論以至多元設計程序法之應用。4.在實務上--以台北市及高雄新市鎮為例，研討相關案例並讀設計準則之意含。

name.en: Special Issues of Computer-Aided Architectural Design (I)

description.zh: 本課程主要目標包括以下各方面：1.介紹與瞭解電腦繪圖在環境規劃設計上的應用方法與理論。2.學會建築設計作品的首頁建構與網路基本應用的操作。3.學習建築設計影像處理技術。授課內容主題包括：電腦輔助建築繪圖與網路應用表現，個人Homepage設計，設計作品網頁表現，建築專業影像處理與環境影像改造，平面動態影像處理技術，建築專業輔助繪圖設計軟體的介紹應用。
description.en: The goal of this class:1.	We introduce theory of computer-aided architectural design and we apply the method to environmental planning & design.2.	We learn how to create homepage of architectural design in www.3.	We learn the image process analysis in architectural environment.The contents of this class is included about: the presentation of computer-aided architectural design and application in www, personal homepage design and personal design work's presentation, professional image process analysis in architectural environment, animation of 2D image process and application, introduction and application of professional soft of computer-a

description.zh: 1.	營建組織介紹2.	營建工程概述   3.	預算與成本控制與管理   4.	進度控制與管理5.	施工計劃6.	工程發包與估算作業7.	物料與機具管理8.	合約與規範管理9.	安全衛生管理10.	品質管理
description.en: 1.	Introduction of the construction organization   2.	Introduction of the operation in the construction site  3.	Budget and cost control management   4.	Budget and cost control management5.	Planning of construction engineer project6.	Purchase and Estimate 7.	Material and Equipment control management8.	Contract and specification management9.	Safety and sanitation management10.	Quality control management

description.zh: 1.建築法規體系概述、2.中央法規標準法、3.建築法架構解說、4.建築師法及營造業管理規則、5.省市建築管理規則、6.省市畸零地使用規則、7.面臨現有巷道申請建築原則、8.都市計劃法系簡介及鄉關法規介紹、9.建築技術規則及台北市土地使用分區管制規則、10. 研定(修)中之建築法規介紹。
description.en: 1.	Introduction to the Building Law and Regulation System2.	Building Code3.	Construction Code4.	Urban planning Code5.	Zoning Code6.	Analysis on New Directions of the Codes

description.zh: 以初學者為對象,基本理論與實際並重.從緒論,微生物之形態,分類與變異,微生物一般特性,微生物之發酵代謝,微生物催化劑等係簡介應用微生物之一般基礎概念.然後敘述釀造食品工業,微生物應用工業,微生物之遺傳與育種,微生物特殊機能之應用,培養工程學等,最後介述生物科技與化學工業之關係等.使讀者對各項微生物工業之應用技術,具有全般性概念.
description.en: This course introduces the general concepts of Bioscience and Biotechnique Especially, it aims on Applied Microbiology, such as the fundamental knowledge of the characteristics and classification, Mechanisms of fermentations, general biochemistry, the microbial biocatalysts, Fermented-foods, Applied Microbial Industries etc. In addition, it includes genetics, Special uses of Bionics, and describes the reaction between Biotechnology and Chemical Industries, among them, it cares with the protection of Environmental.

description.zh: 本課程介紹目前各種材料的結構.性質及功能,並且就各種工程材料如金屬.高分子.陶瓷材料的製程加以討論.1. 材料科學及工程緒論.2. 原子結構及鍵結.3. 結晶構造及晶體幾何學.4. 凝固程序及結晶缺陷.5. 材料之機械性質.6. 金屬材料.7. 高分子材料.8. 陶瓷材料.9. 腐蝕.
description.en: This course is designated to acquaint the student with the strictures, properties and performances of materials. It contains the following topics:1. introduction to materials sciences and engineering.2. atomic structures and bonding.3. crystal structures and crystal geometry.4. solidification and crystalline imperfections.5. mechanical properties of materials.6. metals.7. polymers.8. ceramics.9. corrosion.

description.zh: 介紹工業觸媒在化學工業上所扮演的重要角色與有關吸附與催化之理論基礎，使學生瞭解工業觸媒的各種型態、物性、化性、鑑定方法、基本製造方法、性能評估及動力測試等內容在工業上實際應用例包括氫化、氧化、烷基化、裂解、重組、分餾、脫硫工程、汽車廢氣之控制以及藥物之合成。
description.en: Studies of homogeneous and heterogeneous catalysis, with emphasis on industrial applications. Catalytic processes, engineering problems, catalysts preparation, deactivation and regeneration also discussed.

description.zh: 本課程綜合的介紹電化學之原理與其應用.在原理方面包括離子之作用及其平衡,電解質之導電性質,界面現象,電極電位,電化學電池和電極動力程序等內容.而在應用方面則涵蓋溶液物理參數測量,電化學分析技術,電化學感應器,電鍍,表面處理,金屬腐蝕防治,電池,電透析和電合成等
description.en: This course provides a comprehensive introduction to principles of electrochemistry and its applications. In the principles which includes ionic interaction, ionic equilibrium, the conducting properties of electrolytes, interfacial phenomena, electrode potentials, electrochemical cells and electrode kinetic process. For the application covers determination of physical parameters in the solutions, electroanalytical techniques, electroplating, electrochemical sensors, surface finishing, metal corrosion prevention, cells, electrodialysis, and electrosynthesis etc.

description.zh: 本課程強調表面化學性質之基本原理及其應用。內容可分成三部份：（一）液體之表面張力、熱力學及有關表面電力方面之性質，潤溼、清潔、乳化及起泡。（二）固體表面化學強調固體表面之生成及鑑定，固液間之接觸角、吸附及溶液表面分子的黏著現象。（三）介紹固氣界面，氣體及蒸汽在固體表面上之吸附，化學吸附及催化。
description.en: The course describes the foundamental principles and the application of Surface Chemistry, which is concentrated in following three major fields:(1) The surface tension, thermodynamics of the liquids and their related electrical properties, wetting, cleaning, emulsification and foaforming.(2) The surface chemistry of solid state emphasizes the formation of a solid surface, its characterzation, the liquid-solid contact angle, the adsorption, and the adhesion phenomena on molecular basis.(3) The interfacial phenomena at the solid-gas interface, the adsorption of gas or vapor on the solid surface, the chemistry of adsorption and the catalysis.

description.zh: 本課程之目標在(一)使學生瞭解重要化學品之合成原理與工業上的合成程序；(二)使學生瞭解合成反應與反應機購及工業合成程序的應用。內容包括基本合成原理，有機合成反應，無機合成反應，重要化學品之合成與利用。
description.en: Studies of syntheric principles of chemical and synthetic processes of industry. Chenmical reaction of synthesis, mechanism of chemical reaction, application of processes of industrial synthesis also included.

description.zh: 介紹各種精密化學分析儀器之原理及應用﹐學習組成結構之 鑑定、物種之分離及分析之工作方法。
description.en: Instruments are the tools for gathering qualitative and quantitative information about the composition and structure of matter, students must develop an understanding of these tools and how they are used to solve analytical problems.

description.zh: 本課程的目標在使學生了解工業安全衛生的重要,熟悉有關知識及緊急措施,從而增加處變之因應能力.內容包括工業安全衛生組織,事故調查分析,工廠設備安全要領,工業衛生和衛生設備.
description.en: TThis course is design to introduce the student to concept of the importance of industrial safety and health with emphasis on the ability of dealing with accidents. Topics covered are organization of industrial safety , analysis of Accident ,industrial health and facilities.

description.zh: 反應工程是在商業規模之考慮下對化學反應開發利用之相關工程活動。其目的在成功的設計和操作化學反應器，並使化學工程在工程專業中成為一個獨特的支系。此高等反應工程是延續大學部己學習在均相中有關之簡單觀念及理論，並推展到非均相較複雜系統之設計及操作上。學生在修習此課後，對於較複雜之反應器有清晰及整體之概念。
description.en: Under commercial scale consideration, chemical reaction engineering is that engineering concerning the exploitiaton of chemical reactions Its goal is the successful design and operation of chemical reactors and it sets chemical engineering apart as a distinct branch of the engineering profession. This aduanced chemical reaction engineering is a continuative study of simple idea and principle for homogeneous systems and extended to heterogeneous and more complex systems for design and operation. After study in this course, the student can obtain clear and unified coucept of complex reactor systems.

description.zh: 課程內容包括擴散原理、兩相之間的質傳理論，亂流的質量傳遞，涉及化學反應的質傳，同時發生質量與熱量的傳遞，以及多成分的擴散現象。
description.en: Topics covered include theory of diffusion, interphase mass transfer theory, mass transfer in turbulent flow, mass transfer with chemical reaction, simultaneous mass and heat transfer, multicomponent diffusion.

name.en: Special Topics on Urban Disaster Prevention

description.zh: 介紹國內外"都市防災基本計畫"之沿革，內容；探討都市防災之規劃，設計；都市更新（災後重建）中防災的課題；防災生活圈與防災據點之設立原則。
description.en: Introduce the "Urban precaution basis plan"of Taiwan and other countries; Study the subjects regarding to city renewing or reduiding after the caution;discuss the principles to set up the living zones and preecaution bases for urban disaster prevention.

name.en: Special Topics of Disaster Prevention and Civil Engineering

description.zh: 本課程之內容主要訓練學生獨立思考，培養學生對土木防災之認識，進而學習土木工程在防災上的應用，並進行專題報告、專題演講及研究小組討論。
description.en: This course is trying to train independent thinking, to cultivate understanding precaution of civil engineering for students. This course is also learning the application of precaution of civil engineering. In the class we have case study, seminar, and group meeting.

name.zh: 基礎工程監測及檢測評估
name.en: In-situ Testing and Monitoring in Foundation Engineering

description.zh: 基礎工程施工期間，由於破壞原有的平衡，經常造成土壤或結構物的沈陷，傾斜，龜裂及破壞等，本課程介紹如何藉由監測的量測值，來分析評估基礎工程的安全性，同時也可配合非破壞性檢測的方法，來評估結構或土壤的力學性質，再進而評估安全性。

name.zh: 土壤與結構物互制行為
name.en: Interactive Behavior between Soil and Structure

description.zh: 土壤與結構物之間的界面有應力的存在，該應力的大小與土壤及結構物的力學性質有關，也與結構物的變形有關.列如:地下室開控過程中，擋土結構物的變形，擋土牆的變位,基樁的變位等等。
description.en: The stress between soil and structure depends on the mechanical properties of soil and structure,and also influence the deformation of structure. Such as the excavation of basements and piles etc...

description.zh: 本課程係以商用繪圖CAD軟體（如 TCAD 或 ACAD等）為教學範本，內容包括二維製圖，三維製圖，修訂功能表，命令腳本（Script）以及圖組(Block)、圖形功能表等之製作，以輔助機械製圖為主要目標。
description.en: Use commercial CAD Software (e.g.: Turbo CAD or Auto CAD) as the Tuitional examples for Mechanical Drawings, including 2-D and 3-D drawings, to edit and to modify the Menu, Script and Block etc

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。二技三年級實施普通班體育正課教學。
description.en: The teaching goal is to establishing students have a Health life、Sportsmanship、Team work and Life time exercise habit.  All Freshman students are required to attend two hours per week of Physical Education class.  For Freshman level, Classes focus on basic physical strength training.

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。二技三年級實施普通班體育正課教學。

All Freshman students are required to attend two hours per week of Physical Education class.  For Freshman level, Classes focus on basic physical strength training.

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。二技三年級實施普通班體育正課教學。
