description.zh: 個人或國家都無法自外於當今的國際社會；政治、經濟、社會、文化各層面皆受到國際間互動的影響下，為增進知識青年具備國際化的視野與認知，以因應時代發展趨勢，在強化技術研究的基礎上，拓展國家、社會與個人的發展空間。本課程內容包括基本理論與國際關係的動態，涵蓋國際社會的結構與演變、國際行為的類型及支配此行為的各種力量、國際事務的現象、本質及因果關係。
description.en: An individual or a country may not keep alien to today's internatonal community. Owing to internationally interactive influence with respect to politic, economy, society and culture, the purpose of the course is to equip intellectual youths with internaitonalized sight and awareness to keep pace with the develolpment trend of times, and to expand the space for national, social and individual development on basic of reinforced technical research. The contents of the course include basic theory and the situation  of international relations, covering the structure and changes in the international community, the type of international behavior, and various forces dominating such behavior, the phenomenon, essence, cause and consequence of international affairs.

description.zh: 為建構多元化台灣社會民主法治觀念，並拓展台灣政治發展的時間深度，以加強傳統與現代的有機聯繫，本課擬從以下方向發展：１．中國歷代政治得失評析：一個治亂興亡的觀點。２．現階段政府所面對的政治、經濟、社會與文化等挑戰３．實際憲政制度之運作對台灣政治發展之影響。４．政治文化與政治社會化研究。５．立憲民主政府的主要類型比較。６．民主憲政與人權保障探源。７．政治參與－政府機關對人民的政治活動。８．民主國家國會結構比較研究。９．從總統委任直選到總統直選－理論與實際。10．現代政治中行政與立法的關係。11．司法正義與司法革新。12．政治發展與政治穩定。
description.en: This course is intended to help students understand the constitutional development of Taiwan, and the relation between tradition and modern period so as to establish democratic concepts in this multi-cultural society.  This course will study the basis of our Constitution, and explore the following items: 1. the Chinese political development 2. what the challenge our government is facing at the present time 3. the consequence and impact of Constitution operation 4. the political culture and political sociology 5. comparison among various constitutional governments 6. democratic systems and human rights 7. political participation--state vs civil society 8. comparisons of the congress of democratic countries 9. theory and practice of the Presidential election systems 10. relation between the executive Yuan and legislation  11. judicial justice and judical reform 12. political development and steadiness.

description.zh: 從早期的原住民社會，到漢人移民社會的建立，乃至今日多元化的工商業社會，在不同的年代歌謠與大眾生活的關係密切。傳統社會中民間歌謠具有祈福、教化、娛樂等功能，為數甚巨的民間歌謠是理解庶民社會的重要途徑；而當今社會中流行歌謠雖是商業機制下的產品，但其映見了大眾的情感與價值觀，也記錄了社會變遷的軌跡。本課程主要以台灣的歌謠為文本，透過歌謠內容的爬梳整理，以歌謠為史料建構大眾的生活圖像，生動地呈現出台灣社會變遷的面向。 從早期的原住民社會，到漢人移民社會的建立，乃至今日多元化的工商業社會，在不同的年代歌謠與大眾生活的關係密切。傳統社會中民間歌謠具有祈福、教化、娛樂等功能，為數甚巨的民間歌謠是理解庶民社會的重要途徑；而當今社會中流行歌謠雖是商業機制下的產品，但其映見了大眾的情感與價值觀，也記錄了社會變遷的軌跡。本課程主要以台灣的歌謠為文本，透過歌謠內容的爬梳整理，以歌謠為史料建構大眾的生活圖像，生動地呈現出台灣社會變遷的面向。
description.en: From the early aboriginal society to the immigrant society of the Hans and even to the current society, songs--in different period of times--always play an important role in civil life. In traditional society, folksongs perform the functions of instruction, religion and entertainment. A large number of folksongs serve the gateway to understand the common people.  Though today's pop-songs are the products of entertainment business, they still reflect common people's emotions and values as well as label the mark of social change.  Taiwanese songs (including folksongs and pop-songs) are important texts in this course. Through the analysis of the song lyrics, the students are expected to draw a vivid picture of the social change in the past.

description.zh: 素描是一切繪畫基礎，設計產品，有美的意念，還要有能力將之畫出來，才算完成，否則即成空泛理論。(一)鉛筆練習：線條方向、明暗度變化、立體概念、光影效果等。(二)方形器物練習：以平移法正確掌握立方體造形，並將明暗效果表現出來。(三)圓柱體練習：畫易開罐飲料罐，能繪出其質感效果和細部文字、圖樣。(四)圓形物練習：能把握造形、質感、量感、光澤，以水果為練習對象，如蘋果、橘子等。(五)多種形體練習：如松果、貝殼、落葉等，均能把握其造形、質感、光影特色。由完全沒有概念開始，訓練至有寫生能力，也學得耐心、細心和觀察力。
description.en: Sketch is the base of painting. The product design and concept of beauty must be expressed; otherwise, it will become only a talk.Contents:1.Pencil practicing: lining, chiaroscuro, cubism, lighting, etc.2.Square ware practicing: controlling the cubism styling with a horizontal movement, also, expressing chiaroscuro, etc.3.Cylinder practicing: drawing beverage can with the sense of its quality, detail, and picture.4.Round object practicing: styling, quality, quantity, luster; also, drawing fruit, such as, apple, orange, etc.5.Multiple-shape practicing: such as, pin cines, shell, falling leaves with the sense of styling, quality, lighting, etc.The course is to train students who have are inexperienced to sketch with the ability of patient, detailing, and observation.

description.zh: 本課程旨在欣賞篆竟藝術，認識我國歷代著名的篆竟家與優美的作品，由作品之中廣泛瞭解篆竟多樣化的美感表現與技法，並嘗試實現於創作。篆竟是我國特有的一種藝術形式，除了日常日信的實用功能之外，更普遍使用在書法或繪畫等藝術作品中。因此瞭解篆竟藝術之美，往往是面對其他藝術作品時所不可或缺的。篆竟創作必須在方寸微小的天地之內，專注構思，謹慎刻畫。如此苦心經營的體驗，同時也是十分可貴的精神陶冶。
description.en: This course enlightens students on the art, the arlists and the masterworks of seal cutting. Form the appreciation of great works, students sharpen the understanding of the versatile beauty and skills exerted in seal cutting.Seal cutting is a unique form of art in China. It is commonly applied in signets, and extensively connected with calligraphy and painting stampings and other artistic performance. Therefore, the understanding of seal cutting is supposed to be an inevitable way to unveil the curtain of Chinese art palace. Students are expected to work out the composition of seal cutting within centimeters;hence,their concentration and deliberation can be spontaneously molded.

name.en: The Romance of Three Kingdoms and The Chinese Culture

description.zh: 本課程之設計係針對非歷史系學生研習之用。基本上，以眾所熟知的歷史小說《三國演義》為主軸，來探討中國文化的發展過程中，其在歷史上所扮演角色地位。在文化精神上，它結合了儒、墨、道、法、縱橫家的智慧結晶，開創了新時代的思維視野，對映著儒家文化的另股反思力量，擴展了豐富的文化精神，具有著人生啟示作用。準此，來充實學生文化素養，課程方面包括《三國演義》的文化心理結構，倫理觀，儒、墨、道、法、縱橫家的政治思想，與人物形象之塑造等，藉以幫助學生清晰地認識《三國演義》文化精神在中國文化內涵中之特色。再授課方面，以師生共同討論為主，書面報告為輔，期使學生在短時間內認識《三國演義》的時代精神，並對日後生活有所助益。
description.en: This course is designed for non-history majors. It is chiefly intended to interpret the role and significance of the historical fiction The Romance of the Three kingdoms in the development of the Chinese culture.In the spiritual aspect, The Romance of the Three kingdoms demonstrated the intellectual essence of Confucianism, Mohism,Taoism, the legalist school, and the political strategist school of ancient China. It also innovates new visions and new horizons in the traditional Confucian milieu, thus enriching the spirituality of the Chinese culture. The course includes the following topics of The Romance of the Three kingdoms ：the cultural psychological structure, the ethic view, the political views of Confucianism, Mohism, Taoism, the legalist school, and the political strategist school, the characterization, etc. The class activities include lectures and discussions; students are also expected to submit written reports.

description.zh: 本課程將使學生學習到氣象的一些基本知識，並應用於日常生活中。內容包括太空中的地球、天氣的要素、鋒面與風暴、世界的氣候、氣候變遷、天氣的觀測與分析、天氣預報、雲的種類、天象導覽、天氣觀察者指南等。
description.en: This course will let students learn the basic knowledge of the weather and use it to their life. The content includes the earth in the space, elements of the weather, fronts and storms, climate of the world, climate change, observing and analyzing the weather, types of clouds, field guide to the sky, weather watcher's resource guide.

description.zh: 本課程專為主修非生命科學領域的大專學生所設計，透過日常生活常見的現象，介紹生物學幾個主要學門領域的概念，使學習者能夠瞭解生物學知識在生活中的應用。課程以講解、簡易實驗操作、討論和分組報告進行，包括：細胞學、生物技術、人體構造功能、植物構造與功能、生態學。課程的重點在於生物相關訊息的蒐集、理解、資料整理、判讀，希望能夠建立學生接觸非主修領域知識的習慣，有更廣泛和自由的思維。
description.en: This course is designed for non life science major students. Through events usually occur in everyday life, we will explore the relationship between Biology and our daily life. The goal of the course is to create an environment which lets students contact with the field with which they are unfamiliar, and to understand it with interest. Course activities include : lectures, group discussion, simple experiments. The important topics of the course include : cell, biotechnology, human health, horticulture.

description.zh: 本課程的目標在培養學生具備有關健康的知識，以度過健康的一生。為達成此目標，本課程提供學生四方面內容。一、健康與人生概述，包括人生的意義，健康的境界，認識自己的身體；二、生理健康之道，包括健康的飲食門道，體重控制與運動處方，學習終身修練的功夫，用葯知識；三、心理健康之道，包括健康的人格發展，情緒管理，健康的人際關係，健康的性，健康的家庭生活，健康地面對老化與死亡；四、健康的生活環境，包括物理、化學與生物的環境，健康的職場生活，健康的休閒生活等。本課程除講授法外，並用影片、討論、個別習作等方式教學。
description.en: This subject is to cultivate the students to be full of health knowlodge and to lead them have healthy and happy lives, For getting this object this course offers the students with four arear of knowledge. First, the introduction:including meaning of life, significacne of health, know oneself's body. Second, the ways for getting physical health including food and types of nutrients, determining desirable weight, principles of exercise programs, learning a life-long Kun fu, medical use of drugs. Third, the ways for getting mental health:including good development of personality, management of emotion, good interpersoal relationship, healthful sexuality, happy family life, coming to terms with aging and death. Fourth, healthful environment:including physical, chemical and biological environment, professional, socia and leisured lives of suitability. For most effective learning, the metho of video,discuss and indivdual practice teaching are as well used as the lecture.

description.zh: 本課程將有系統的介紹西洋各類藝術的來龍去脈，基本知識和理論，解說各時代之繪畫風格，重要畫家，以及著名建築、雕刻、手工藝等，以幻燈教學，使學生瞭解西洋藝術，具備欣賞能力，並能滌淨心靈。課程內容包括: 1.史前藝術：包括洞窟藝術、骨雕石雕等。2.上古藝術：如西亞、埃及、希臘、羅馬、波斯、印度等線畫、雕刻、建築。3.中世紀藝術：拜占廷、東羅馬藝術。4.文藝復興：包涵繪畫、雕刻建築、壁畫等。5.十七、八世紀：巴洛克、洛可可時代。6.近代繪畫：如新古典主義、浪漫派、印象派等。7.現代藝術：野獸派、立體派、超現實主義、象徵主義、抽象派、達達派、普普、歐普、新寫實、未來派、構成派等畫派之繪畫。
description.en: The contents of this course are constructed as following :1.Prehistoric Art : including"The Art of Engraving ", "Carving designs on bone ","Carving designs on stone "..etc. 2.Previous Ancient Art: For instance, the painting engraving architecture of Siya, Egypt, Greece, Rome, Persia, India.etc 3.Art of Middle Ages: Art of Byzantine, Art of Rome. 4.Renaissance: including Painting, Engraving, architecture, fresco etc. 5.Seventeenth and Eighteenth Centuries: Periods of Baroque. Rococo. 6.Modern Painting: for instance, Neoclassicism. Romanticism. Impressionism etc. 7.Contemporary Art: The painting of fauve, Cubism, Surrealism, symbolism, Abstract Art, Dada, Pop Art, Op Art, Neorealism, Futurism, Formalism…etc. The interpretation will include styles of different period, important artists, famous architectures, engraving handicrafts and so on. The Slides will be used as a teaching assistance to help students understand Western Art.

description.zh: 首先介紹歌劇中音樂的元素、本質及角色，欣賞各時期不同類型之歌劇作品，繼由「世界三大男高音」看歌劇曲目的走向，吸引新生代同學對歌劇之響往，帶領愛樂者進入歌劇欣賞的境界。
description.en: This one-semester course is designed to let students learn:  1.to approach to their first opera with open minds and open ears 2. to understand what opera is.  3. to know the essential elements of opera－composers and librettists,  singers, conductors, directors, as well as designs and expenses,...etc.. 4.to understand the development of opera 5.to appreciate opera through watching films of various kind 6.to be able to enjoy opera for the rest of their life.

description.zh: 法學概論，顧名思義是在介紹法律原理，以啟發學生法學研究的興趣。然而，法學涵蓋的層面甚廣，法學緒論的課程，只能大略介紹各種法律的共通原理，就繁駁的法律現象，作綜合的引說，俾使初學法律的人，不僅能粗知「實定法」的共通原則，還可藉此原則來培養法律見解和修養，執簡馭繁，因而體會法律的性質、內涵和理念。有關本課程的教授方式，擬先介紹法律的基概念及原理，並以答問之方式訓練學生邏輯反思的能力，同時輔以日常屢見之法律實例問題。如此，學生不僅可以可以學習正確的法律觀念和知識，並可培養縝密思辨的能力，將課堂上所習得的知識應用落實在日常生活中，以達保障並維護自己及他人權益之目的。
description.en: Introduction of Law is to introduce the theory of law and to promote students' interest to study law. Since the field of law is very broad but the time is limited, this course can briefly explain common principles of law, complex phenomena of law, etc. The main purpose of this course is to let students catch the concept of common principles of "lex scripta."  Also, this course aims to promote students' knowledge about law, thus cultivating their spirit of abiding by law.  This course will introduce the basic concept and theory of law first. Then students will be given logical training through discussion.  Besides, the general cases and problems of law will be covered as well. Through this course, students can not only get correct concepts of law, but learn to protect their/others' right.

description.zh: 一、教學目標：幫助同學把毛筆字練好，進而培養欣賞能力。二、其教學內容包含1.鑑賞相關知識。2.名碑帖之認識3.篆刻、裱褙    之簡介4.行書、楷書之臨模與創作5.書論之研讀。三、評量則以整學期先後習作之比較出情訂定其成績。
description.en: The purpose of this course is to improve students' ability of appreciating Chinese calligraphy as well as the practice of handwriting skill. The contents include: 1. The knowledge of appreciation 2. Introduction of masterpieces. 3. Introductory studies of seal carving and traditional Chinese picture mounting. 4. Chinese calligraphy practice 5.reference materials study. Grading will be based on the improvement of students` works through all semester.

description.zh: 人的身體一接觸自然界，便開始各個器官的功能，人不如機器，無法汰換零件，加上身體機能遇到問題之後，許多人往往不知如何處理應對，甚至身體出現徵兆也渾然不知。所以此科目最主要的目的是希望藉由對醫學的認識，讓大學生們更瞭解自己的身體，進而保護並時時自我偵測身體是否正常運作，要培養健全的大學生，而不是只會讀書的大病貓。
description.en: Once the human body contacts the natural environment, the organs of the body begin to function.  But the human body can not change it's organizational like machine.  So when our body's function is in trouble, we always have no idea how to solve it, either to find out.  One of these course's objection is to let college students understanding their own body by learning some important medical concepts.  We hope that our country both has excellent and healthy college students,  and not all sick.

description.zh: 台灣經濟的發展已帶動了政治民主化的發展，尤其自解嚴後，政治社會全面變遷，改變幅度之大與範圍之廣，變化之快速與轉變之激烈，予人一種眼花撩亂，目不暇給之感。身為明日舞台的主人，要不被社會拖著走，唯有洞察、掌握社會變遷脈動的能力。本課程將以學術理論為你深入分析、客觀探討。
description.en: The economic development in Taiwan resulted in the rapid development in political spheres. Especially after the lifting of the martial law, the changes in politics and society have exerted a great impact.  This course will provide students with the ability to keep track of the changes of the society.  Based on political theories, students will learn how to investigate the phenomena and analyze the reasons of these changes.

description.zh: 人際關係是探討對自我的了解及對人的認知，包括性格、態度、魅力、溝通、壓力、挫折和情緒等重要課題的處理；幫助同學學習與各種不同品味、信念、立場與生活方式的人作有效率的溝通，開放的表達出自己的感覺與想法，以建立良好的合作關係，從而開發潛能、爭取更好的發展機會。
description.en: Interpersonal Relationship is to discuss about self-understanding and perception of other people, including how to handle key issues related to character, attitude, attractiveness, communication, pressure, frustration and emotion.  It helps students to learn effective communication, open their minds to express personal feeling and thought, and try to communicate with other people having different tastes, convictions, standpoints and ways of living so as to establish a harmonic and cooperative relationship and furtherly to develop personal potential and strive for better opportunity of development.

description.zh: 面對科技發展日新月異，社會急驟變遷的新世紀，只習得專業上的一技之長，已不足以和協圓滿地實踐有意義的人生。有鑑於此，乃以生涯發展與生涯諮商的理論與研究為基礎，配合學生的發展，希翼能透過教育的歷程，使學生的專業知識能和未來的工作與生活規劃，產生有意義的聯結，進而為學生提供一個短程與長程的生涯發展與選擇的準備與指引。授課內容包括生涯理念介紹、興趣、性格、價值觀探索，生涯決定因素，生涯技巧，生涯角色調適，生涯選擇與規劃技巧，生涯訪談，生涯高原調適，轉型期調適，性別、職業歧視，雙生涯家庭，就業準備等主要生涯課題的研討與習作。
description.en: In face of a new century with continuous scientific development and rapid social changes, to learn one single professional skill is not enough to fulfill a meaningful life in a harmonic and satisfactory manner. In view of this, based on the theory and research of career development and consultation in association with the development of students,  it is hoped to produce a meaningful linking between their professional knowledge and job and life planning through the course of eucation, and further to provide them a preparation and guide for short and long-range career development and choice. The contents of the course include the discussion and exercise related to major career topics such as introduction to the concept of career, the discussion of interest, character and value, decisive factors of career, skills of career, role adjustment in career, career choice and planning skill, career interview, uphill adjustment in career, adjustment in transit period, sex and occupation.

description.zh: 本課程目標如下：（一）以心理學為基礎，探討人類生活各面向的知識；（二）建立學生生活行為的技能；（三）促使學生建立自己積極的價值體系。  本課程內容涵蓋人類的個體發展、學習方式、動機、情緒、態度、人格、兩性、愛情、家庭、育兒、健康管理、社會行為等生活面的相關行為。  本課程採學生中心教學法，以啟發法、小組討論、創造式發表等方式授課，藉以活潑學生的思考並增加學生上台練習的機會。
description.en: The objectives of this course are : (1)By basing on the psychology   to guide our students to discuss the variant facets of their lives. (2)To establish the students' good skills to deal with their own lives. (3)To found the students' positive value systems .  This course includes the human behaviors of individual development , learning strategies, motivations, emotion, attitudes, personality, social interaction, religious lives, love, bisexual interaction, family lives, children cultivation , and etc. This course uses the learner-centered instructing strategies. The methods of discovery learning, teams discussion, creative teaching , and etc. will be adopted, in order to excite the students to do deep thought and give them the opportunities to show their efforts and achievements themselves.

description.zh: 兩性關係是人際關係的核心問題，它關係著交友的態度、婚姻生活的幸福與社會的祥和。本課程由對兩性差異性的了解為基礎，以尊重為原則，在平等互助的精神中，確定兩性關係的和諧。本課程內容包括理論與實際的配合，儘量以生活化的內容貫穿其間，並注重課程內容的可實踐性，以協助學生處理兩性關係的難題。
description.en: Gender Studies is a core issue of interpersonal relationship.  It involves attitudes toward making friends, marriage and social tranquility.  This course aims to help students become aware of sex difference, understand the importance of respect, equality and mutual-help between sexes.  The contents of the course will cover both theory and practice, providing cases and examples related to our daily life so as to help students handle problems when getting along with the opposite sex.

description.zh: 為了讓學生有機會學習有系統的瞭解、接納自己，體諒父母、尊長，關愛別人，回饋社會，進而發揮潛能，自主自在的過一生，乃設計此種10～15人的獨特小團體，運用團體動力，以「交流分析」(Transactional Analysis,TA)為主要理論架構，採理論與實務、個別與團體並重方式，在師生積極參與中，討論、分享、成長。課程內容主要包含交流分析概述，人格結構與功能分析，自我圖，關愛經濟，愛的證言，交流方式分析，時間結構分析，心理遊戲分析，心理劇本分析的理論與習作等。
description.en: In a systematic way, this course will help students understand themselves, accept themselves, and understand their parents and elders.  Also, it teaches students how to care for other people and have contributions to society with a view to promoting students' potential and live their life self-confiently and freely.  The class is to be desinged into groups composed of 10 to 15 students in each section in order to make use of group interactions, to encourage students to actively participate in class discussion and experience sharing.  On the basis of Transactional Analysis(TA), both theory and practice, individual and group activities are emphasized.  Through such a focus, students will go through various stages leading to personal growth.  The contents of this course include: an introduction to TA, an analysis on personality, self-realization, caring and love experiences, transactional analysis, psychological tests, and game analysis, theory and exercise on psychological plays.

description.zh: 本課程以培養學生尊重與欣賞不同族群、不同時空、不同價值觀所產生的音樂而設。藉由對音樂元素、本質的認知及介紹，欣賞各時期作曲家之代表作品，培養西方音樂的基本常識，建立音樂欣賞的專業態度。教學目標：1.提高學生音樂欣賞的素養，充實其音樂生活的內涵，2.激發學生對音樂的興趣，培育愛樂人口，增進社會祥和的原動力，3.介紹古今中外音樂名家名作，啟發學生對音樂創作的認知與敬重，4.建立學生對古典音樂、民族音樂、應用音樂及通俗音樂等不同類型音樂的正確認知與包容力，培養世界性的音樂觀。授課內容：1.概論, 2.歌樂, 3.器樂, 4.儀式音樂, 5.舞蹈音樂, 6.戲劇音樂。
description.en: This course aims to cultivate students' ability to appreciate music of different ethnic groups, different time and place, different value systems. Through the introduction of basic music elements as well as the appreciation of the masterpieces of various composers, it is hoped that students will build up basic music knowledge about music and enhance professional music appreciation potentiality in music. The goals include: 1. Elevating students' capability in music appreciation 2. Inspiring students' interest in music with a view to improving our society into a harmonious world. 3. Introducing domestic and international famous composers' pieces 4. Touring of various forms of music: classical, ethnic, applied and popular music. Contents of this course include: 1.Introduction 2. Vocal music 3. Instrumental music 4. Ritual music 5. Dance music 6. Theatre music

description.zh: 人類社會中的經濟活動愈來愈錯綜，人與人之間的經濟關係也愈來愈複雜，但無非都是為求經濟問題的解決。如何將有限的資源在諸多可行的途徑中，選擇最有利、最能發揮滿足人們慾望的效果，乃是身為「經濟人」的萬物之靈所努力的目標。本課程提供學習者分析經濟現象的工具，掌握經濟發展的脈動，以便在現代經濟社會中立於不敗之地。
description.en: In human society economic activity is getting more and more complicated and economic relationship between people is also getting more and more complicated but all are to seek for the solution of economic problems. Among a number feasible ways how to choose the best way that can make best use of limited resources to satisfy people's desire shall be the goal for human being as "economic persons" making effort to fulfill. The course enables students to learn the tools for the analysis of economic situation, the way of grasping the wave of economic development in Taiwan so as to win in the modern economic society.

description.zh: 1.微算機系統架構介紹，2.輸出入埠設計及程式控制，3.輸出入埠應用(鍵盤介面、LED顯示介面)，4.A/D、D/A介面設計，5.PC介面(PIO及SIO)設計，6.單晶片之設計與應用，7.設計微電腦硬體結構。。
description.en: 1.Introduction to microcomputer system architectrue2.I/O port design and programming control3.Applications of I/O ports: Keyboard, LED ...4.A/D, D/A interfacing design5.PC interfacing (PIO and SIO) design6.Design and application of a Single-chip system7.Hardwared design of microcomputer system

notes: 實習二選一修課上限25人綜科104

description.zh: 本課程內容包括通風系統基礎，工業通風，排煙設計，空氣過濾、送風系統設計及安裝與測試，以系統設計為重點。
description.en: The contents of this course include the fundamentals of ventilation system, industrial ventilation, exhaust design, air filtration, air moving system design, construction and testing, the focus of this course is on the system design.

description.zh: 21世紀是知識經濟的時代，唯有創新是個人及組織(含企業及國家)持續成長的核心能力，工科類科的學生，特別是研究所及在職同學，面臨全球化激烈變動的潮流考驗，除了要具備技術力，面臨技術創新的挑戰外，也應對本科技術外的各種創新領域深入瞭解，並能多予以駕馭，即時掌握時機發揮創新的潛力，開創成功的事業及美好的人生。其課程內容含指：1.基本原理(創新義涵、創新思維、創新模型、創新來源及移轉)2.辨認創新潛力、降低不確定性3.動態競爭分析、創新的實現及利潤的保護4.全球化創新、新興經濟體的創新5.策略創新的程序6.冷凍空調工程創新應用7冷凍空調工程創新實例研討8創新工程未來學的原理及應用。
description.en: The power of innovation is the only core-competence for both individuals and organizations (include:enterprise and country)to maintain their continuing growth during the coming 21 century-the ERA of knowledge economy.  For the studens in engineering school., especially for those students who are studing in graduated school, Affiliated College of Continuinand Education and still on job., the program of Innovation Engineering Technical and Management, bring them new concept and lead them to keep and handle any opportunity to approach their life goal and to deal with their future carrier planning.The program include:1.fundamental (definition、thinking way modle of innovation source and transfer of innovation)2.recognizing the potential of an innovation reducing uncentainty 3.Dynamic competitive annnalysisinnovation implementing 4.globalization for innovation innovation of Emerging Economies 5.strategies innovation process 6electrical/mecanical systems and engineering innovative appl

description.zh: 本課程著重食品冷凍之原理、設備、儲存及應用技術，使學生深入了解食品冷凍之精髓。課程涵蓋︰（1） 食品儲存方式與設備。（2） 食品微生物理論（3） 各種食品之冷凍方式與原理（4） 工業食品冷凍系統（5） 食品冷凍運輸之方法和技術（6） 超低溫食品冷凍技術
description.en: This course is concentrated in the fundamentals facility storage and application technology of food refrigeration.  The students should be familiar with the principles of food refrigeration after these lectures.     The topics of this course are:(1) Food storage and equipment.(2) Food microbiology and refrigeration.(3) Refrigerating technology of various food products.(4) Industrial food freezing systems.(5) Distribution technology of chilled and frozen food.(6) Cryogenics in food refrigeration.

description.zh: 從闡述各種汽車共生系統在特定的工業製程，商業智慧型大樓或大學校園區域網路型式等能源有效利用的整合規劃設計，主要課程內容為： 1.汽車共生系統概念 2.熱力循環的技術理論 3.多元化的原動機利用 4.複合循環發電廠 5.都會型汽電共生利用 6.汽電共生的能源管理 7.汽電共生的環境管理 8.各種熱電轉換裝置 9.高級能源轉換科技之汽電共生
description.en: By studying this course, the following terms can be identified, defined, used: 1.The Concept of Cogeneration system 2.Theory of Cogeneration Technology. 3.Combined cycles plant. 4.Heating and cooling integration with power generation. 5.The Design Concept and Demonstrated economic performance of cogen. sys. 6.Social and Environmental management of cogen. sys. 7.Conversion Method and Technology on advanced system.

description.zh: 本課程之教學目標在使學生瞭解數位訊號處理的理論基礎及其應用技巧。課程內容包含：(1)離散傅立葉轉換及快速傅立葉轉換 (2)Z-轉換在信號處理上之應用 (3)相關函數，迴旋積分及其應用 (4)FIR數位濾波器設計 (5)IIR數位濾波器設計 (6)適應性訊號處理介紹 (7)工程應用及實例研討。
description.en: This course introduces the basic theory of digital signal processing and its application. The course outline includes: (1) Discrete-time Fourier Transform and Fast Fourier Transform (2) Z-Transform and its application (3) Correlation Fucntion, Convoluation Integral and its application (4) FIR digital filter design (5) IIR Digital Filter Desgin (6) Adaptive Signal Processing (7) Practical Application

description.zh: 數位通訊系統簡介，數位調變及偵測，數據譯碼及錯誤更正碼，同步(載波及時刻訊號的還原)，多工技術，通訊網路技術。
description.en: introduction to design communication systems, digitalmodulation and detection, data signaling and error correction codes, synchronization,multiplexing techniques,communiation networks.

description.zh: 1.晶體結構與晶體生長 2.載體濃度與能階圖 3.載體傳輸,擴散,漂移4.半導體的光電特性 5.pn接面分析
description.en: 1.crystal structures & crystal growth 2.energy-band diagrams& carrier densities 3.carrier transport 4.optoelectronicproperties of semiconductors 5.pn junctions

description.zh: 前言、DSP 架構、指令、定址法乘法加法、量化誤差、假信號FIR 濾波器、濾波器設計
description.en: IntroductionDSP architectureInstructionsAddressing modeMAC instructionsQuantization errorAliasingFIR filtersFilter design

description.zh: 各種時域響應之電腦繪圖，矩陣各項特性分析與應用，根值軌跡圖，波德圖，奈奎士圖，PID控制器之設計，Lead-Lag補償器之設計，控制器時域及頻域分析，控制器在狀態空間之設計，實例探討，書報研讀。
description.en: Course Title:Automatic Control PracticeDescription:This course is first to introduce the basic concepts ofcontrol systems and the mathematical background, second, state thetransfer function, block diagram and signal  flow graph, third,discuss the mathematical modeling of control systems and elements, andforth, describe the time-domain analysis, root locus techniques andfrequency-domain of control systems, and then to measure the characterof control systems, Finally, the design of control system will beintroduced.

description.zh: 1. 可程式控制器(PLC)概論2. PLC指令說明與應用3. PLC I/O介面4. A/D、D/A介面5. PLC與電腦連線6. 分散式控制系統7. 中小型PLC網路系統8. PLC選用9. PLC網路監控系統10. PLC應用實習5~7個
description.en: 1. Introduction to PLC (Programmable Logic Controller)2. PLC Instructions and Applications3. PLC I/O Interfaces4. A/D and D/A Interfaces5. PLC and PC Communications6. Distributed Control System7. PLC Network8. PLC Selection9. Monitor Control System10. Laboratory work: 5~7 experiments

description.zh: 1. 程式語言類別2. 物件導向與資料抽象化3. 類別與方法4. 訊息，實例與初始化5. 繼承6. 靜態與動態繫結7. 多型性8. 發展環境及工具9. 物件導向程式語言C++,Java,Smalltake簡介10.應用實例
description.en: 1. Programming Language Paradigms2. Object-Orientation and Data Abstraction3. Classes and Methods4. Messages,Instances,and Initialization5. Inheritance6. Static and Dynamic Binding7. Polymorphism8. Environment and Tools9. Introduction to C++,Java,and Smalltalk10.Case Study

description.zh: 電機分析基本理論，基準座標原理，對稱感應機理論，同步電機理論，同步電機運轉阻抗及時間定數，感應機與同步機線性化運作方程式，同步機簡化運轉方程式，感應機與同步機平衡運作特性，感應機與同步機計算模擬。
description.en: principle of electric machine,d-q axis transformation,theory of symmetrical induction machines and synchronousmachines,linealization of induction and synchronous machineequations,modeling of induction and synchronous machines.

description.zh: 示波器技巧，移位暫存器，計數器串接，SRAM之技巧，DOT LED驅動，LCD驅動，ADC技巧，DAC技巧，其他複雜的數位IC的實習，GAL燒錄程式練習，PALASM語法與範例，模擬器語法與範例，以GAL設計組合邏輯電路，以GAL設計循序邏輯電路。
description.en: 1.The skill of oscilloscope2.shift register3.counter cascading4.The skill of SRAM5.Driving the dot LED6.The skill of ADC7.Practice the GAL Writer8.PALASM Syntax and example9.Simulator Syntax aerial example10.Combinational circuit design11.Sequeutial circuit design

Course Title:MicroprocessorDescription:This course introduces the working principles of computer.It puts emphasis on both hardware and software, as well as both theoryand appplication. Basically, this course covers the introduction ofgeneral microprocessors:their architecture and operation, Assemblylanguage program and module program, instruction addressing mode,instruction operation, and I/O Program and interface. Morespecifically, multi-programming configuration and multi-processingconfiguration are also discussed here. New topics will be added ifneeded.

description.zh: 主要介紹陶瓷之製程及所應用的範圍.
description.en: Introduction to The processes of ceramics materials and their application

description.zh: 主要介紹陶瓷之製程及所應用的範圍.
description.en: Introduction to The processes of ceramics materials and their application

description.zh: 本課程主要是講述由粉末冶金技術製造的材料與產品包括：高熔點材料、超硬質材料、超耐熱材料、燒結電接點材料、燒結機械另件燒結摩擦材料、燒結磁性材料等，以期讓學過粉末冶金課程的學生，能進一步對粉末冶金技術之應用有更多的了解。
description.en: The course mainly lecture the materials and products which are made by powdermetallurgy techniques, including high melting material, super hard material, superheat resistant material, sintered electricjoint material, sintered mechanical parts, sintered friction material, sintered magnetic material, etc., it is expected students wholearn the powder metallurgy course may have further understanding to theapplication of powder metallurgy techniques.

name.zh: 製造科技特論及實驗(一)
name.en: Special Topics and Experiments of Manufacturing Technology(

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意本課程包括理論與實驗，由製科所教授共同開課。第一學期探討的範圍主要在製造技術，側重在與製造業相關之專業知識。.
description.en: This course includes theories and experiments, is conducted by several professors of institute of manufacturing technology. In first semester, topics covered are mainly in the field of manufacturing technology, emphasizing in professional knowledge of manufacturing industry.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意介紹最新的製造技術。利用物理式及化學式的製造方法來加工新進材料，使用新進光電能源及新進製造工具如雷射、電子束、離子束、電漿、鑽石、化學反應劑等，適應生產微小精密工件之需求，應用電腦化資訊處理設備以監控、診斷及調適製程，以達到智慧型製造的目的。
description.en: Introducing newest manufacturing technology.  Applying  physical and chemical manufacturing methods to process advanced materials, using advanced power source and tools like laser, electron beam, ion beam, plasma, diamond, chemical react agents, adapting the demand for producing small and precision parts, Implementing computerized data processing facilities to control, monitor, diagnose, adapt manufacturing process, in order to achieve the idea of intelligent manufacturing.

description.zh: 本課程的目的是協助研究生準備進行有關設計創造力開發、創意設計手法與設計方法論等主題之碩士論文研究或實務專題設計，提供各種理論工具與個案演練。課程內容包括(1)人工智慧、心理學、人類學和語言學等導向之設計創造力研究，以及(2)規則式與案例式推理、基模類比與聯想、產品俗民誌、模式語言和體驗劇本等創意設計手法演練。
description.en: The objective of this course is to help the graduate students whose topics of master's theses or graduate projects are related to creativity development, creative design skills and methodology, to prepare their preliminary studies. This course provides the necessary theoretical tools and case studies, and its contents contain (1) design creativity research based on artificial intelligence, psychology, anthropology and linguistics, as well as (2) exercises of creative design techniques: rule-based reasoning and case-based reasoning, schematic analogy and association, product ethnography, pattern language and experiential scenario.

description.zh: 全適性設計專題在探討多元化使用族群適用的產品、環境、和溝通，以尊重人性福址為前提之設計創新思維，開啟新產品開發策略做法，滿足各種各樣的使用者需求。從相關的理論和案例研討，到專題設計的研發，體認詮釋性設計思維方法與實務。
description.en: It is a worldwide design movement that wants to make products, environments and communication usable to the greatest extent possible by the broadest number of users including children, older adults, people with disabilities, people of atypical size or shape, people who are ill of injured, and people inconvenienced by circumstances. Universal design respects human diversity and promotes inclusion of all people in all activities of life. It is not an identifiable style but a way of thinking about the design process. Universal design defines good design as attractive and user-friendly.

description.zh: 以親人性、創造力跨科際整合的設計思維，對設計知識與專業技能之理論及實務，從文獻探討、理論專研、實務案例等深入淺出，培養設計專業領域相關知能、洞見和體認，期能對設計相關問題解決，提出整合、創新、前瞻之具體可行方案。
description.en: In an age of rapid social, technological and cultural change, we need a new kind of design professional who is able to bring the creativity, innovation, flexibility and knowledge needed to exploit new opportunities and make things happen. Through literature review, theoretical study, and case study, this course provides design related competence and new insights, in terms of tacit knowledge, ideation, humane, and interdisciplinary thinking.

description.zh: 工業設計在產品開發上，係一多元素、多因素組合的系統性與整合性工作，其在企業內執行的成敗，關鍵在於：(1)企業組織體系是否能有效應用工業設計的功能，(2)設計部門是否能有效管理控制本身的設計品質，(3)設計行政事務工作(包括人事資料、材料及日程進度等)是否能有效率的管理與執行。因此本課程旨在研究探討設計專業上的高階之管理知識與技能，課程內容包含(1) 設計功能的管理、(2) 設計品質的管理、與(3) 設計行政的管理，課程並輔以實例專案研討驗證。
description.en: Industrial design is an integral activities with in product development. It's effect in organization depends on; 	1.The understanding and the applying of industrial design from    	  the TOP management organization.2.The management of design quality with in the design function. 	3.The efficiency and the effectiveness of design administration.Therefore, the content of this Special will including the theory and practice of 1.The management of design function.2.The management of design quality.3.The management of design administration.

description.zh: 本課程以理論介紹，案例蒐集整理並實際專案演練方式探討劇本法。其內容以敘述情境故事的方式形成新產品或策略，及如何合理有效地規劃出具實際可行的產品或策略有關之場景、人物側寫、產品架構及意象。
description.en: This course focused on the theory and practice about Scenario Planning which integrates product concept, story board, user group profiles, product architecture and product image as a new product strategy or development scheme。

description.zh: 產品設計專案包含研究與設計。設計專案透過工業設計的理論、方法及程序，以研究的手段形成設計決策，或以實證的方式將研究成果應用於設計實務。設計專案之設計成果必須建立在相關的研究基礎上。
description.en: This course is directed toward an approved product design project withresearch and design completed under supervision of the director. Theory andpractice in research and development dealing with the design project isreviewed in the study. Projects must represent a meaningful contribution tothe field of design base on supportive research.

description.zh: 家具設計專案包含研究與設計。設計專案透過工業設計的理論、方法及程序，以研究的手段形成設計決策，或以實證的方式將研究成果應用於設計實務。設計專案之設計成果必須建立在相關的研究基礎上。
description.en: This course is directed toward an approved furniture design project withresearch and design completed under supervision of the director. Theory andpractice in research and development dealing with the design project isreviewed in the study. Projects must represent a meaningful contribution tothe field of design base on supportive research.

description.zh: 空間設計專案包含研究與設計。設計專案透過工業設計的理論、方法及程序，以研究的手段形成設計決策，或以實證的方式將研究成果應用於設計實務。設計專案之設計成果必須建立在相關的研究基礎上。
description.en: This course is directed toward an approved environment design project withresearch and design completed under supervision of the director. Theory andpractice in research and development dealing with the design project isreviewed in the study. Projects must represent a meaningful contribution tothe field of design base on supportive research.

description.zh: 數位革命時代的來臨，資訊科技已普遍應用於產品開發，解決日趨複雜的設計體系與程序。本課程之目的在於介紹資訊管理系統之架構與相關技術，探討如何建立一套產品開發的資訊管理系統，分析、整合、儲存、管理及控制跨部門的產品設計資料與工作流程。
description.en: Information technology, which makes the digital revolution happen, has been the crucial solution to the difficulty and complexity of product development. This course discusses the framework and contents of design information management system, that provides the tools to analyze, synthesize, manage, and control the information and procedure of product development.

description.zh: 研究複合材料原理及應用，複合材料之高分子科學，預浸料，模壓料，壓力釜成型與真空袋技術，繞線成型，編織成型，熱可塑複合材料，拉擠成型及複合材料力學及應用。
description.en: The aim of this course is to learn the principle of composite and its application.  Several composite processing methods are included.They are prepregs, molding compounds, autoclave and vaccum bag method.  Filament winding, braiding, thermoplastic composite, pultrusion are also included.  Finally, mechanic of composite and its application are discussed in detaile.

description.zh: 本課程之目的在培養學生論文尋找及期刊選讀之能力，每位學生必須針對專一之問題尋找最近相關的資料。問題的認定，由老師協助資料之準備及口頭報告等是學生不可少的。且一學期至少須報告2次。學期成績將以學生在課堂上參與的態度及兩份書面資料決定。
description.en: This course is aimed at providing a training of review and paper studies for 4th grade students. Students are requested to search for the latest papers for a specific topic. Presentation and discussion are required for all attendants, twice persemester. The final score for a student will be determined based on students interaction in the class and two written reports.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。專利權認識與管理，著作權認識與保護，商標權認識與管理，營業秘密與競業禁止，電子商務認識與運用。
description.en: Introduction and management of Patent, Introduction and protection of Copyright, Introduction and management of Trademark, Trade Secret and Competitive business forbidden, Introduction and application of e-commerce.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。包括液滲檢測法、磁粉檢測法、放射線、超音波檢測法、中子射線、全像攝影檢測法等、針對各種檢測方法之原理、可靠度、靈敏度等作探討。
description.en: Liquid-Penetrant Examination, Magnetic Particle Examination, Radiographic Examination, Ultrasonic Examination, and other less common techinques. Physical  Bases  of  Tests, Materials  to which applicable, Calibration Standards, and  Reliability.

description.zh: 先修課程：3002014或負責教授同意。基本熱傳理論、郎肯循環：蒸汽發生設備、渦輪機、冷凝器、泵及風扇、氣輪機及複合循環；核能原理、PWR、BWR、GCR、LMFBR；再生能源：地熱、太陽能、風力、海洋能源；能源之儲存；環境污染之防治。
description.en: Principles of Heat Transfer, Rankine Cycle: Steam Generators, Turbines Condensers, Pumps and Fans, Gas-Turbine and Combined Cycles, Principles of Nuclear Energy, Nuclear Power Plants: PWR, BWR, GCR, LMFBR, Renewable Energy Resources: Geothermal Energy, Solar Energy, Wind Energy, Energy from the Oceans, Energy Storage, Environmental Aspects of Power Generation.

description.zh: 複習矩陣及向量、狀態空間描述法、求解狀態空間方程式、可控制性及可觀察性、穩定性分析、狀態變數回饋系統的設計、簡介最佳控制、簡介強健控制。
description.en: Review of matrices and vectors, state space representation of control systems, the solution of the state space equations, controllability and observability, stability analysis, design of state variable feedback systems, optimal control systems, and robust control systems.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。材料科學與工程緒論、原子結構與鏈結、結晶構造與幾何結晶學、凝固、結晶缺陷與固體中的擴散、金屬材料之機械性質、聚合材料、相圖、工程合金、陶瓷材料、複合材料、腐蝕、材料的電性質、光性質與超導材料、磁性材料。
description.en: Introduction to Material Science and Engineering, Atomic Structure and Bonding, Crystal Structures and Crystal Geometry, Solidification, Crystal Imperfections and Diffusion in Solids, Mechanical Properties of Metals, Ploymeric Materials, Phase diagram, Engineering Alloys, Ceramic Materials, Composite Materials, Corrosion, Electrical Properties of materials, Optical properties and Superconducting Materials, and Magnetic Materials.

name.en: Introduction to Thin Film Science and Engineering

description.zh: 薄膜材料科學，真空科學與技術，薄膜蒸鍍製程，放電、電漿、離子與表面作用，物理氣相沈積，化學氣相沈積，基材表面與薄膜成核，薄膜結構，薄膜性質測試，薄膜之相互擴散、反應與轉換，薄膜之機械性質。
description.en: 1. Thin film materials science2. Vacuum science and technology 3. Thin film evaporation processes4. Discharge, plasma, and ion-surface interaction5. Plasma and ion beam processing of thin films6. Chemical vapor deposition7. Substrate surfaces and thin film nucleation8. Film structure9. Characterization of thin films and surface10. Interdiffusion, reactions, and transformations in thin films11. Mechanical properties of thin films

description.zh: 自動化機械設計、驅動器及感測器、自動化機構合成及應用、數位電路設計及應用、氣液壓及電控回路之邏輯設計、監控系統、自動化系統之規化及評估。
description.en: Automated Machinery Design, Actuators and sensors, Automatic mechanism synthesis and applications, Logic design of pneumatic, Hydraulic and electronic control loop, Monitor and control system, automation system, Planning evaluation.

description.zh: 技職教育相關法令、大學法、師資培育法、教師法、教育人員任用條例...等主要法令；教育人員法律素養、公文基本概念、習作與處理。
description.en: Knowledge of current case law and legislation, sensitivity to legal issues, application to legal principles related to education services in school.

description.zh: 企業經營體制個案診斷，以診斷方式、技術、步驟及書面、口頭報告應如何撰寫。
description.en: This topic focus on the case study which based on diagnostic method, technique, skill, procedure, and reporting and presenting skill..

description.zh: 網路環境具有互動性,虛擬經驗等,因此消費行為有別於傳統環境之下,本課程首先探討傳統市場與電子市場之經濟分析,接著探討網路消費者行為理論，虛擬社群,虛擬經驗,網路廣告與互動品質.互動行銷技術, 顧客服務管理, 顧客關係層次,交易成本理論,網路行銷企業模式,互動技術顧客關係.
description.en: Consumer behavior on the net is different with the traditional commercial environment. The topics include interactivity, and virtual experience. Topics of this course include: the economic of electronic market, consumer behavior theory, virtual community, virtual experience, quality of interactivity, interactive technology, customer service on the Internet, levels of customer relationship, transaction cost theory, Internet business model, interactive technology and customer and channel relationship.

description.zh: 本課程旨在探討全球運籌管理之相關議題如：1.全球運籌之產業環境；2.全球運籌之經營模式與績效衡量；3.全球運籌之運作模式；4.全球運籌之4PL；5.全球運籌與之其他相關議題，如物流、金流及通關等；6.案例研討；7.我國全球運籌管理之未來發展。
description.en: This course includes following sections:1.Global logistics environment;2.Global logistics business model and performance   evaluation;3.Global logistics operation model;4.4PL in global logistics environment;5.Other issues related global logistics, like logistic flow   and customer;6.Case study.7.The furture trend of R.O.C. global logistics managment.

description.zh: 數學與物理是學習理工科目必備的工具，然而很多同學卻視為畏途。探究其原因，是抽象的思維方式以及部分不合實用的作法，造成學習上的障礙。本課程希望藉由電腦的輔助，將數學、物理與工程數學上幾個重要的觀念具體化，使學生能對抽象觀念有直覺式的體驗，結合理論與實際，進一步提升分析問題的能力。
description.en: Mathematics and Physics are prerequisites for learning science and engineering; nevertheless, many students are afraid to study them. Investigating into the problem, we find that the way of abstract and some impractical methods hinder them from learning those subjects. In this course we will study some major concepts including Mathematics, Physics and Engineering Mathematics etc. and combine the theorems and the realities by the aid of computers to promote our students the capability of analyzing.

description.zh: 本課程之目標為：充實生活技能、提升科技素養、豐富生活內涵、培養繼續進修之興趣與能力，以奠定終身學習及生涯發展之基礎。本課程之內容為：一、電腦基本概念，二、電腦功能與應用，三、資料處理，四、資訊管理，五、資訊網路，六、電腦的聲光世界，七、電腦的安全問題與防治，八、未來的資訊社會。
description.en: This course is designed to help student to learn another skill, better understand technology, enrich there live and inspire their interests for further study. The course includes: 1.basic knowledge of computer; 2.the application of computer; 3.data procession; 4.data control; 5.internet; 6.multimedia; 7.computer virus; 8. the world of information.

description.zh: 本課程教導學生作為一位諮詢顧問師所需具備的技巧及在今日工商社會中有效溝通的要件。本課程所涵蓋的主題為：1.管理諮詢的目的和範圍，2. 顧問師的職責和角色，3. 諮詢的過程，4. 計劃書的擬定與合約的草擬，5. 訪談與展示的技巧，及6. 手冊與研究報告的撰寫。學生必須完成一項分組個案來應証對本課程所教授的管理諮詢與溝通技巧。
description.en: This course teaches the students basic skills possessed by a management consultant and the criteria for effective communication in today's business community. Topics covered by this course are: (1) Scope and Purpose of Management Consulting, (2) Duties and Roles of A Consultant, (3) Consulting Process (4) Writing a Proposal and Drafting A Contract, (5) Interview and Presentation Skills, and (6) Development of a Manual and Report Writing. A group project is required to demonstrate student's understanding of the consulting and communication skills learned in this course.

description.zh: 先修課程:負責教授同意半導體元件、整流電路，電晶體和電路，運算放大器、線性積體電路，邏輯元件，數位電路，數位積體電路，微處理器，放大器等。
description.en: Semiconductor Device, Rectifier circuit, Transistor Circuit, Operational Amplifier, Linear Integrated Circuit, Logic Device, Digital Circuit, Digital Integrated Circuit, Micro Processor, Amplifier, etc..

description.zh: 本課程將有系統的介紹世界上最新的光電科技發展及在台灣的相關光電產業。時間上規劃以第一小時介紹基本光電理論，第二小時介紹應用技術與實例。課程內容包括：1.雷射光與原理與應用， 2.雷射光與精密量測， 3.雷射光與機械人， 4.光電技術與半導體製造， 5.光資訊與光儲存， 6.光纖通訊系統， 7.紅外系統， 8.紫外線系統， 9. 雷射醫學應用， 10雷射光與國防， 11.光學設計與光學設計軟體， 12 光電科技與未來。
description.en: The course gives the outlook of the technology of Opto-electronics and the industry of Opto-electronics in Taiwan. The contents of this course are constructed as following：1. The principles and applications of Laser, 2. Laser and precise measurements, 3. Laser and robot, 4. Opto-electronics technology and semiconductor magnification, 5. Optical information and Optical storage 6. Optical fiber communication, 7. Infrared system, 8. Ultraviolet system, 9. Medical applications of laser, 10. Laser and defense 11. Optical design and software. 12. Opto-electronics and future.

description.zh: 中文概述：專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論。
description.en: Case study. Seminar. Group meeting.

description.zh: 專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論
description.en: Literature Study, Seminar, Group meeting.

description.zh: 本課程將介紹冷凍工程，以及其應用系統，內容涵蓋如下：一.冷凍工程原理及系統。二.食品冷凍工業。三.工業冷凍。四.超低溫冷凍系統與應用。五.冷凍運輸。六.特殊冷凍應用。
description.en: This course introduces the refrigeration engineering and its system application. The contents cover the following topics: 1) The principles and system application of refrigeration engineering, 2) Food refrigeration, 3) Industrial refrigeration, 4) Extra-Low-Temperature refrigeration system and application, 5) Transport refrigeration, 6) Special application of refrigeration.

description.zh: 基本控制系統的動作方式、位置控制、比例控制、積分控制、微分控制、各種組合控制、氣壓控制裝置、電動及電子控制裝置、液壓控制裝置、空調設備上的各種控制包括溫度、壓力、風量、濕度等之控制。
description.en: To provide students with the concepts of control actions: two position control, proportional control, floating control, integral control, derivative control; to familiarize students with pneumatic control devices, fluid control devices, damper & valves, elementary control systems on HVAC & R systems, include: temperature control, humidity control, static pressure control, flow control and so on.

name.en: Fire Safety and Smoke Control Technology

description.zh: 先修課程︰流體力學、熱力學本課程主要針對建築物防火及排煙技術作深入探討，主要闡述︰1. 火災動力學2. 防火材料性質3. 排煙技術4. 防火排煙設備5. 防火材料及設備測試6. 建築物防火排煙設計
description.en: The main objective of this course is to offer a postgraduate level of the knowledge of fire safety and smoke control technology for buildings.The course includes the following topics:1. The outline of the dynamics of a fire2. The property of fire safety materials3. The smoke dynamics and smoke control technology4. The facilities for fire safety and smoke control.5. Testing of materials and facilities for fire safety and smoke control.6. Design of a fire safety and smoke control system for a building.

description.zh: 一、線性連立方程式二、矩陣基本運算三、行列式四、向量空間與基底五、線性相依與線性獨立六、線性轉換七、正交空間八、特徵值與特徵向量
description.en: As a basic mathematics in engineering,the course Linear Algebraemphasizes on the subjest of matrix computation(theory) and thetechnique of mathematical proving.The outline of the course includes the following:1.Systems of Linear Equations2.Matrices3.Determinants4.Vector Spaces5.Linear Transformations6.Eigenvalues and Eigenvectors7.Advanced Topics: selet one of the following if time permitted:  Numerical Techniques in Matrix operations,Jordan form,or     Linear Programming.

description.zh: 先修課程:負責教授同意．煞車動力學，煞車性能之極限，液壓煞車系統及元件，鼓式煞車，碟式煞車，駐車煞車，真空輔助動力煞車，液壓輔助動力煞車，電動輔助動力煞車，防鎖死煞車系統．
description.en: Brake Dynamics, LImit of Braking Performance, Hydraulic-Brake-System Components, Drum Brake, Disc Brake, Parking Brake, Vacuum-Assist Power Brake, Hydraulic-Assist Power Brake, Electro-Hydraulic-Assist Power Brake, Antilock Brakes System。

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。  數位系統簡介，數字系統及編碼，基本邏輯操作，數位積體電路設計，布氏代數與卡諾圖，組合電路設計與應用，正反器，暫存器，順序電路設計與應用，計數器與計時器，多工器與解多工器，記憶體，微處理機架構簡介。
description.en: Introduction to Digital Circuits, Digital Systems and Coding, Basic Logic Operations,  Boolean Algebra and K-Map, Combinational Logic Circuits, Flip-Flop, Register, Sequential Circuit Design and Applications, Counter  and Timer, Multiplexer and Demultiplexer, Shit Register and Memory, Introduction to Micro-processor.

description.zh: 先修課程:3001051或負責教授同意。參數化設計之介紹及應用、特徵基底模型之建立及組合、模型特徵之拷貝及仿造、目標導向設計之概念及應用、複雜曲面特徵之合成及修整、模型特徵從屬關係之介紹、圖層之產生及使用、模型組件之合成及修改。
description.en: Introduction and Applications of Parametric Design, Construction and Assembly of Feature Based Models, Copying and Patterning of Model Features, Concept and Applications of Design Intent, Synthesis and Triming of Complex Surface Features, Introduction to Parent-child Relationship Between Model Feature, Generation and Usage of Layers, Synthesis and Modification of Model Assembly.

description.zh: 本課程將透過每週專題演講方式，讓學生了解有機材料之最新開發成品或最先進之研究成果。演講者之安排將以校外知名專家學者及校內各計畫執行者為主。
description.en: This course will provide important information regarding to the latest development or application on the organic materials. Speakers being invited are well-known scholars in organic area.  Graduate students or thesis advisors will also be invited to report any in interesting result from their graduate studies.

description.zh: 1.雙極性電晶體 2.蕭特基接面 3.MOS結構 4.MOSFETS 5.CMOS電路及 製程   6.各種IC技術
description.en: 1.bipolar junction transfors 2.metal-semiconductor junctions 3.MOS structors 4.MOSFETS  5.CMOS circuits & processes 6.IC fabrication technologies

description.zh: (1)向量分析 (2)靜電場理論：庫倫，高斯定律，電位能，電場能量與功，介電質電場現象，電容 (3)拉普拉斯方程式，電像法、邊界值問題 (4)靜磁場理論：畢沙瓦特，安培定律，磁位能，磁場能量與功，強磁性材料特性電感 (5)電磁感應與馬克斯威爾方程式。
description.en: Course Title:ElectromagnetismDescription:This is an introductory course of electromagnetic bias onits Engineering applications. The course is divided into five parts(1) the static electric field, (2) the steady electric current, (3)the static magnetic field, (4) the quari-stationary electromagneticfield and, (5) Maxwell equations and their applications.Besides, the course also introduces some of the optical technology.

name.en: Traditional architecture of Taiwan in Special Topics

description.zh: 教育評鑑範圍、目的、嚴格與發展，評鑑策略、評鑑結果分析及應用。
description.en: In depth study of objectives, scopes, development, strategies of educational evaluation, and the application & analysis of the result in evaluation.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。基本概念、生產預測、產品/服務設計、生產製程與產能規劃、設施佈置、工作系統設計、生產計劃、生產管制、存貨管理、全面品質管理、設備預防保養。
description.en: Fundamental Concepts, Production Forecasting Product/Service Design, Production Processes and Capacity planning, Facility Layout, Job system Design, Production planning, Production Control, Inventory Control, Total Quality Management, Preventive Maintenance.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。材料科學與工程緒論、原子結構與鏈結、結晶構造與幾何結晶學、凝固、結晶缺陷與固體中的擴散、金屬材料之機械性質、聚合材料、相圖、工程合金、陶瓷材料、複合材料、腐蝕、材料的電性質、光性質與超導材料、磁性材料。
description.en: Introduction to Material Science and Engineering, Atomic Structure and Bonding, Crystal Structures and Crystal Geometry, Solidification, Crystal Imperfections and Diffusion in Solids, Mechanical Properties of Metals, Ploymeric Materials, Phase diagram, Engineering Alloys, Ceramic Materials, Composite Materials, Corrosion, Electrical Properties of materials, Optical properties and Superconducting Materials, and Magnetic Materials.

description.zh: 簡介、數位影像處理的基礎、影像的轉換、影像的增強、影像的復原、影像的壓縮、影像分割、影像的表達及描述、自動車導航及醫學影像的處理和應用、論文討論。
description.en: Introduction, Window operation System, API, DDL, Design of DDE and OLE, Structure of Client/Server System, Multimedia, Image Compression, Graphic supervisory/control system.

name.zh: 環境政策與國際環保事務

description.zh: 環境保護近年來備受全球重視，國際環保公約如保護地球臭氧層的蒙特婁議定書及保護瀕臨絕種野生物種的華盛頓公約，都備有貿易條款，對不遵守規範國家，得施以相關貿易制裁；世界貿易組織（WTO）中設置貿易與環保委員會，以協調貿易與環保間之問題與紛爭。因此本課程之目的在於加強學生對我國環境問題、政策及環保國際公約之深入了解，以作為進一步培養對環境規劃及管理之能力。
description.en: The environmental treaties such as Montreal protocol or Basel Convention require all the parties in the world to take appropriate measures to protect human health and the environment against adverse effects.  Therefore, the purpose of this class is to provide the comprehensive information on those international treaties and the resulting efforts and policies in Taiwan

description.zh: 本課程將介紹各種化學工業程序之概況，其中包括各種化學工業程序之原料取得、製造程序、化學原理、 製造設備及產物品質等。
description.en: The course introduces processes and developments of chemical industries, including resources of raw materials, manufacturing process, chemical principles, manufacturing equipments and product qualities.

description.zh: 1. 概論2. 鐵路變電所設計3. 電力遙控系統4. 電車線系統設計5. 干擾與防護6. 動力車的電力供應7. 動力車的電力控制8. 未來發展
description.en: 1. Introduction2. Railway substation design3. Power remote control system4. Catenary system design5. interference and protection6. Power supply of locomotive7. Power control of locomotive8. Future development

name.en: Legal Affairs and Dispute resolution in Construction

description.zh: 本課程主要教授與土木有關之法規，諸如建築法、建築技術規則、都市計劃法、採購法、環保法規、水利法等，併借相關案例之分析研究，訓練學生土木法規之知識與能力。
description.en: The course is dive lessons on code of building , rule of construction technology ,stock up code ,code of environmental protection etc.

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。二技三年級實施普通班體育正課教學。
description.en: The teaching goal is to establishing students have a Health life、Sportsmanship、Team work and Life time exercise habit.  All Freshman students are required to attend two hours per week of Physical Education class.  For Freshman level, Classes focus on basic physical strength training.

description.zh: 本課程討論結晶質固體之基本概念，含晶體之幾何學及數學理論，並進一步討論結晶化學及結晶構造之原理，同時輔以電子顯微鏡法及X-射線法作結晶構造分析。
description.en: This course is to introduce Elements of Crystallography.

description.zh: 藉由說明環境系統化管理之原理，使學生對國際環境管理系統之趨勢與可能的貿易衝擊有充分了解與因應。並共同探討國內企業如何推行環境管理系統，永續發展，以增強企業界之國際競爭力。課程內容包含：(1)環境管理系統，環境績效評估，與環境稽核之原理。(2)歐美日環境管理系統之介紹　 以歐美日資源再回收使用、廢棄物處理、毒性、化學物、重大意    外事件之處理為例，說明環境管理系統之應用實務。(3)國際環境管理標準   介紹ISO9000、ISO14000與TQM，以提昇企業界之品質，降低成本   並提昇國際競爭力。
description.en: Associated with fundamentals and theory, the course provides an overall systematic management framework to solve the problems encountered in Taiwan as well as international countries. The main contents of this course include:(1)Principle in Environmental Management System.(2)Case study on American,Japan and EC for advanced EMS.(3)ISO series (9000 ;14000)and TQM(Total Quality Management).

description.zh: 課程內容包含個體經濟、總體經濟、國際貿易之基本理論與模型、我國臺灣地區經濟發展策略與展望。
description.en: Mcro and macro economics, the theories and models of international trade, the economic development strategies and prospects of the Taiwan region.

description.zh: 課程內容包含個體經濟、總體經濟、國際貿易之基本理論與模型、我國臺灣地區經濟發展策略與展望。
description.en: Mcro and macro economics, the theories and models of international trade, the economic development strategies and prospects of the Taiwan region.

description.zh: 本課程的主要內容是使學習者：具備科學發展史的基本知識；認識科學研究的方法與態度；知道目前科學理論下的宇宙形成、發展、與未來；認知生命科學和物理科學對人類生活互動關係；具備現代人類所應具備的科學素養。
description.en: This course will have some effects for students that learn the basic knowledge of development historic science, and study the methodology and attitude of science research, know the formation, development, and future of universe in science theories at the present day, cognize the interactions of the life science and physics science to human existence, have got the scientific literacy of the be of modern human.
